79 contains
80  ! calculate the equilibrium quantities on a grid determined by straight
81  ! field lines. This grid has the dimensions (n_par,loc_n_r).
82  ! Optionally, for eq_2, the used variables can be deallocated on the fly, to
83  ! limit memory usage.
84  integer function calc_eq_1(grid_eq,eq) result(ierr) ! flux version
85  use num_vars, only: eq_style, rho_style, use_normalization, &
86  &use_pol_flux_e, use_pol_flux_f, export_hel
87  use grid_utilities, only: apply_disc
88  use eq_vars, only: rho_0
89  use num_utilities, only: derivs
90  use eq_utilities, only: calc_f_derivs
91 
92  character(*), parameter :: rout_name = 'calc_eq_1'
93 
94  ! input / output
95  type(grid_type), intent(inout) :: grid_eq ! equilibrium grid
96  type(eq_1_type), intent(inout) :: eq ! flux equilibrium variables
97 
98  ! local variables
99  character(len=max_str_ln) :: err_msg ! error message
100 
101  ! initialize ierr
102  ierr = 0
103 
104  ! user output
105  call writo('Start setting up flux equilibrium quantities')
106 
107  call lvl_ud(1)
108 
109  ! create equilibrium
110  call eq%init(grid_eq)
111 
112  ! choose which equilibrium style is being used:
113  ! 1: VMEC
114  ! 2: HELENA
115  select case (eq_style)
116  case (1) ! VMEC
117  call calc_flux_q_vmec()
118  case (2) ! HELENA
119  call calc_flux_q_hel()
120 
121  ! export for VMEC port
122  if (export_hel) then
123  call writo('Exporting HELENA equilibrium for VMEC porting')
124  call lvl_ud(1)
125  ierr = write_flux_q_in_file_for_vmec()
126  chckerr('')
127  call lvl_ud(-1)
128  call writo('Done exporting')
129  end if
130  end select
131 
132  ! take local variables
133  grid_eq%loc_r_E = grid_eq%r_E(grid_eq%i_min:grid_eq%i_max)
134  grid_eq%loc_r_F = grid_eq%r_F(grid_eq%i_min:grid_eq%i_max)
135 
136  ! Transform flux equilibrium E into F derivatives
137  ierr = calc_f_derivs(grid_eq,eq)
138  chckerr('')
139 
140  ! Calculate particle density rho
141  ! choose which density style is being used:
142  ! 1: constant, equal to rho_0
143  select case (rho_style)
144  case (1) ! arbitrarily constant (normalized value)
145  eq%rho = rho_0
146  case default
147  err_msg = 'No density style associated with '//&
148  &trim(i2str(rho_style))
149  ierr = 1
150  chckerr(err_msg)
151  end select
152  ! normalize rho if necessary
153  if (use_normalization) eq%rho = eq%rho/rho_0
154 
155  call lvl_ud(-1)
156 
157  call writo('Done setting up flux equilibrium quantities')
158  contains
159  ! VMEC version
160  ! The VMEC normal coord. is the toroidal (or poloidal) flux, normalized
161  ! wrt. to the maximum flux, equidistantly, so the step size is
162  ! 1/(n(3)-1)
163  subroutine calc_flux_q_vmec()
164  use vmec_vars, only: rot_t_v, q_saf_v, flux_t_v, flux_p_v, pres_v
165  use eq_vars, only: max_flux_e
166 
167  ! copy flux variables
168  eq%flux_p_E = flux_p_v(grid_eq%i_min:grid_eq%i_max,:)
169  eq%flux_t_E = flux_t_v(grid_eq%i_min:grid_eq%i_max,:)
170  eq%pres_E = pres_v(grid_eq%i_min:grid_eq%i_max,:)
171  eq%q_saf_E = q_saf_v(grid_eq%i_min:grid_eq%i_max,:)
172  eq%rot_t_E = rot_t_v(grid_eq%i_min:grid_eq%i_max,:)
173 
174  ! max flux and normal coord. of eq grid in Equilibrium coordinates
175  ! (uses poloidal flux by default)
176  if (use_pol_flux_e) then
177  grid_eq%r_E = flux_p_v(:,0)/max_flux_e
178  else
179  grid_eq%r_E = flux_t_v(:,0)/max_flux_e
180  end if
181 
182  ! max flux and normal coord. of eq grid in Flux coordinates
183  if (use_pol_flux_f) then
184  grid_eq%r_F = flux_p_v(:,0)/(2*pi) ! psi_F = flux_p/2pi
185  else
186  grid_eq%r_F = - flux_t_v(:,0)/(2*pi) ! psi_F = flux_t/2pi, conversion VMEC LH -> PB3D RH
187  end if
188  end subroutine calc_flux_q_vmec
189 
190  ! HELENA version
191  ! The HELENA normal coord. is the poloidal flux divided by 2pi
192  subroutine calc_flux_q_hel()
193  use helena_vars, only: q_saf_h, rot_t_h, flux_p_h, flux_t_h, pres_h
194  use num_utilities, only: calc_int
195 
196  ! copy flux variables
197  eq%flux_p_E = flux_p_h(grid_eq%i_min:grid_eq%i_max,:)
198  eq%flux_t_E = flux_t_h(grid_eq%i_min:grid_eq%i_max,:)
199  eq%pres_E = pres_h(grid_eq%i_min:grid_eq%i_max,:)
200  eq%q_saf_E = q_saf_h(grid_eq%i_min:grid_eq%i_max,:)
201  eq%rot_t_E = rot_t_h(grid_eq%i_min:grid_eq%i_max,:)
202 
203  ! max flux and normal coord. of eq grid in Equilibrium coordinates
204  ! (uses poloidal flux by default)
205  grid_eq%r_E = flux_p_h(:,0)/(2*pi)
206 
207  ! max flux and normal coord. of eq grid in Flux coordinates
208  if (use_pol_flux_f) then
209  grid_eq%r_F = flux_p_h(:,0)/(2*pi) ! psi_F = flux_p/2pi
210  else
211  grid_eq%r_F = flux_t_h(:,0)/(2*pi) ! psi_F = flux_t/2pi
212  end if
213  end subroutine calc_flux_q_hel
214 
215  ! Plots flux quantities in file for VMEC port.
216  ! Optionally, a perturbation can be added.
217  ! A note about the indices of B_F, B_F_pert and B_F_loc:
218  ! B_F_loc: (pol modes, cos/sin)
219  ! B_F: (pol modes, tor modes, cos/sin (m theta), R/Z)
220  ! B_F_pert: (pol modes, cos/sin (m theta), R/Z, cos/sin (N zeta))
221  integer function write_flux_q_in_file_for_vmec() result(ierr)
222  use eq_vars, only: pres_0, r_0, psi_0
223  use grid_vars, only: n_r_eq
224  use grid_utilities, only: setup_interp_data, apply_disc, nufft
225  use helena_vars, only: nchi, r_h, z_h, ias, chi_h, flux_t_h, &
226  &pres_h, rot_t_h
227  use x_vars, only: min_r_sol, max_r_sol
228  use input_utilities, only: pause_prog, get_log, get_int, get_real
229  use num_utilities, only: gcd, bubble_sort
230  use num_vars, only: eq_name, hel_pert_file_i, hel_export_file_i
231 #if ldebug
232  use grid_utilities, only: setup_deriv_data, apply_disc
233 #endif
234 
235  character(*), parameter :: rout_name = &
236  &'write_flux_q_in_file_for_VMEC'
237 
238  ! local variables
239  integer :: id, jd, kd ! counters
240  integer :: jd_min ! start value of jd, possibly excluding N = 0 from equilibrium
241  integer :: n_B ! nr. of points in Fourier series
242  integer :: nfp ! scale factor for toroidal mode numbers
243  integer :: tot_nr_pert ! total number of perturbations combinations (N,M)
244  integer :: nr_n ! number of different N
245  integer :: n_loc, m_loc ! local n_pert and m_pert
246  integer :: n_id ! index in bundled n_pert
247  integer :: istat ! status
248  integer :: plot_dim(2) ! plot dimensions
249  integer :: rec_min_m ! recommended minimum of poloidal modes
250  integer :: pert_type ! type of perturbation prescription
251  integer :: lim_r(2) ! limits in r range for plot
252  integer :: r_prop ! r at which to use proportionality factor
253  integer, allocatable :: n_pert(:), m_pert(:,:) ! tor. mode numbers and pol. mode numbers for each of them
254  integer, allocatable :: m_pert_copy(:,:) ! copy of m_pert, for sorting
255  integer, allocatable :: piv(:) ! pivots for sorting
256  integer, allocatable :: nr_m(:) ! number of different M for every N
257  integer, allocatable :: nr_m_copy(:) ! copy of nr_m, for sorting
258  character(len=1) :: loc_data_char ! first data character
259  character(len=2) :: plus ! "+ " or ""
260  character(len=8) :: flux_name(2) ! "poloidal" or "toroidal"
261  character(len=6) :: path_prefix = '../../' ! prefix of path
262  character(len=max_str_ln) :: pert_file_name ! name of perturbation file
263  character(len=max_str_ln) :: err_msg ! error message
264  character(len=max_str_ln) :: file_name ! name of file
265  character(len=max_str_ln) :: plot_name(2) ! name of plot file
266  character(len=max_str_ln) :: plot_title(2) ! name of plot
267  real(dp) :: m_tol = 1.e-8_dp ! tolerance for Fourier mode strength
268  real(dp) :: delta_loc(2) ! local delta
269  real(dp) :: plot_lims(2,2) ! limits of plot dims [pi]
270  real(dp) :: norm_B_H(2) ! normalization for R and Z Fourier modes
271  real(dp) :: mult_fac ! global multiplication factor
272  real(dp), allocatable :: R_H_loc(:,:) ! local R_H
273  real(dp), allocatable :: Z_H_loc(:,:) ! local Z_H
274  real(dp), allocatable :: delta(:,:,:) ! amplitudes of perturbations (N,M,c/s)
275  real(dp), allocatable :: delta_copy(:,:,:) ! copy of m_pert, for sorting
276  real(dp), allocatable :: BH_0(:,:) ! R and Z at unperturbed bounday
277  real(dp), allocatable :: BH_pert(:,:) ! BH perturbed by cos(M theta) or sin(M theta)
278  real(dp), allocatable :: BH_deriv(:,:) ! theta derivative of R and Z
279  real(dp), allocatable :: B_F(:,:,:,:) ! cos and sin Fourier components
280  real(dp), allocatable :: B_F_pert(:,:,:,:) ! cosine and sine of fourier series of perturbation
281  real(dp), allocatable :: B_F_loc(:,:) ! Local B_F
282  real(dp), allocatable :: u_norm(:,:) ! normalized unit vector
283  real(dp), allocatable :: theta(:,:) ! pol. angle: (geometric, HELENA (equidistant))
284  real(dp), allocatable :: prop_B_tor(:,:,:) ! proportionality between delta B_tor and delta_norm
285  real(dp), allocatable :: prop_B_tor_F_loc(:,:) ! local fourier coefficients of prop_B_tor
286  logical :: zero_N_pert ! there is a perturbation with N = 0
287  logical :: pert_eq ! whether equilibrium is perturbed
288  logical :: stel_sym ! whether there is stellarator symmetry
289 #if ldebug
290  real(dp), allocatable :: BH_0_ALT(:) ! theta derivative of R and Z
291  type(disc_type) :: deriv_data ! data for derivatives in theta
292 #endif
293 
294  ! initialize ierr
295  ierr = 0
296 
297  ! test if full range
298  if (min_r_sol.gt.0 .or. max_r_sol.lt.1) then
299  ierr = 1
300  err_msg = 'This routine should be run with the full normal &
301  &range!'
302  chckerr(err_msg)
303  end if
304 
305  ! set up local R_H and Z_H
306  allocate(r_h_loc(nchi,n_r_eq))
307  allocate(z_h_loc(nchi,n_r_eq))
308  r_h_loc = r_h
309  z_h_loc = z_h
310  if (use_normalization) then
311  r_h_loc = r_h*r_0
312  z_h_loc = z_h*r_0
313  end if
314 
315  ! get input about equilibrium perturbation
316  ! Note: negative N values will be converted to negative M values and
317  ! Possibly negative delta's.
318  call writo('Do you want to perturb the equilibrium?')
319  pert_eq = get_log(.false.)
320 
321  zero_n_pert = .false.
322  if (pert_eq) then
323  call writo('How do you want to prescribe the perturbation?')
324  call lvl_ud(1)
325  call writo('1: through a file')
326  call lvl_ud(1)
327  call writo('It should provide N M delta_cos delta_sin in four &
328  &columns')
329  call writo('Rows starting with "#" are ignored')
330  call lvl_ud(-1)
331  call writo('2: automatically deduced from toroidal magnetic &
332  &perturbation')
333  call writo('3: manually')
334  call lvl_ud(-1)
335  pert_type = get_int(lim_lo=1,lim_hi=3)
336 
337  select case (pert_type)
338  case (1) ! from file
339  ! user input
340  call writo('File name?')
341  read(*,*) pert_file_name
342 
343  ! open
344  err_msg = 'Could not open file '//trim(pert_file_name)
345  do kd = 0,2
346  call writo('Trying "'//path_prefix(1:kd*3)//&
347  &trim(pert_file_name)//'"')
348  open(hel_pert_file_i,file=path_prefix(1:kd*3)//&
349  &trim(pert_file_name),iostat=ierr,status='old')
350  if (ierr.eq.0) then
351  call lvl_ud(1)
352  call writo("Success")
353  call lvl_ud(-1)
354  exit
355  end if
356  end do
357  chckerr(err_msg)
358  call writo('Parsing "'//trim(pert_file_name)//'"')
359 
360  ! get number of lines
361  istat = 0
362  tot_nr_pert = 0
363  do while (istat.eq.0)
364  ! read first character of data
365  read(hel_pert_file_i,*,iostat=istat) loc_data_char
366  if (istat.eq.0 .and. loc_data_char.ne.'#') then ! exclude comment lines
367  tot_nr_pert = tot_nr_pert + 1
368  end if
369  end do
370  rewind(hel_pert_file_i)
371  loc_data_char = '#'
372 
373  ! set error message
374  err_msg = 'Could not read file '//trim(pert_file_name)
375  case (2) ! automatically
376  call writo('toroidal modulation mode number?')
377  n_loc = get_int()
378 
379  call writo('normal range for which to plot toroidal &
380  &ripple proportionality?')
381  lim_r(1) = get_int(lim_lo=1,lim_hi=n_r_eq,ind=.true.)
382  lim_r(2) = get_int(lim_lo=lim_r(1),lim_hi=n_r_eq,&
383  &ind=.true.)
384 
385  ! calculate the proportionality factors
386  call calc_prop_b_tor(lim_r,prop_b_tor)
387 
388  if (lim_r(1).eq.lim_r(2)) then
389  r_prop = lim_r(1)
390  else
391  call writo('which normal position to use?')
392  r_prop = get_int(lim_lo=lim_r(1),lim_hi=lim_r(2),&
393  &ind=.true.)
394  end if
395 
396  ! NUFFT for chosen value
397  ierr = nufft(prop_b_tor(:,r_prop-lim_r(1)+1,2),&
398  &prop_b_tor(:,r_prop-lim_r(1)+1,1),&
399  &prop_b_tor_f_loc)
400  chckerr('')
401 
402  ! rescale to 1cm
403  prop_b_tor_f_loc = prop_b_tor_f_loc/max(&
404  &sum(prop_b_tor_f_loc(:,1)),&
405  &sum(prop_b_tor_f_loc(:,2)))/100
406 
407  tot_nr_pert = 1 + 2*size(prop_b_tor_f_loc,1) - 2
408  case (3) ! manually
409  ! user input
410  call writo('Prescribe interactively')
411  call writo('How many different combinations of &
412  &toroidal and poloidal mode numbers (N,M)?')
413  tot_nr_pert = get_int(lim_lo=1)
414  end select
415 
416  ! ask for global multiplication factor
417  if (pert_type.eq.1 .or. pert_type.eq.2) then
418  call writo('Globally multiply with some factor?')
419  call lvl_ud(1)
420  call writo('Now: maximum deformation: 1m')
421  call writo(' minor radius: '//&
422  &trim(r2strt((maxval(r_h_loc)-minval(r_h_loc))/2))//'m')
423  call writo(' major radius: '//&
424  &trim(r2strt((maxval(r_h_loc)+minval(r_h_loc))/2))//'m')
425  call lvl_ud(-1)
426  if (get_log(.false.)) then
427  mult_fac = get_real()
428  else
429  mult_fac = 1._dp
430  end if
431  end if
432 
433  ! set up n, m and delta (use maximum possible size, possibly +1
434  ! if N=0 is not a perturbation, and limit afterwards)
435  allocate(n_pert(tot_nr_pert+1))
436  allocate(m_pert(tot_nr_pert+1,tot_nr_pert+1))
437  allocate(delta(tot_nr_pert+1,tot_nr_pert+1,2))
438  allocate(nr_m(tot_nr_pert+1))
439  nr_n = 0
440  nr_m = 0
441  do jd = 1,tot_nr_pert
442  select case (pert_type)
443  case (1) ! from file
444  do while (loc_data_char.eq.'#')
445  ! read first character of data
446  read(hel_pert_file_i,*,iostat=ierr) &
447  &loc_data_char
448  chckerr(err_msg)
449  if (loc_data_char.ne.'#') then ! exclude comment lines
450  backspace(unit=hel_pert_file_i) ! go back one line
451  read(hel_pert_file_i,*,iostat=ierr) &
452  &n_loc, m_loc, delta_loc
453  chckerr(err_msg)
454  delta_loc = delta_loc*mult_fac
455  end if
456  end do
457  loc_data_char = '#'
458  case (2) ! automatically
459  m_loc = jd/2
460  if (m_loc.ne.(jd-1)/2) m_loc = - m_loc
461  delta_loc = prop_b_tor_f_loc(jd/2+1,:)*mult_fac
462  case (3) ! manually
463  call writo('For mode '//trim(i2str(jd))//'/'//&
464  &trim(i2str(tot_nr_pert))//':')
465  call lvl_ud(1)
466 
467  ! input
468  call writo('Toroidal mode number N?')
469  n_loc = get_int()
470  call writo('Poloidal mode number M?')
471  m_loc = get_int()
472  call writo('Perturbation strength ~ cos('//&
473  &trim(i2str(m_loc))//' theta - '//&
474  &trim(i2str(n_loc))//' zeta)?')
475  delta_loc(1) = get_real()
476  call writo('Perturbation strength ~ sin('//&
477  &trim(i2str(m_loc))//' theta - '//&
478  &trim(i2str(n_loc))//' zeta)?')
479  delta_loc(2) = get_real()
480 
481  call lvl_ud(-1)
482  end select
483 
484  ! has N = 0 been prescribed?
485  if (n_loc.eq.0) zero_n_pert = .true.
486 
487  ! possibly convert to positive N
488  if (n_loc.lt.0) then
489  n_loc = -n_loc
490  m_loc = -m_loc
491  delta_loc(2) = -delta_loc(2)
492  end if
493 
494  ! bundle into n_pert and m_pert
495  n_id = nr_n+1 ! default new N in next index
496  do id = 1,nr_n
497  if (n_loc.eq.n_pert(id)) n_id = id
498  end do
499  if (n_id.gt.nr_n) then ! new N
500  nr_n = n_id ! increment number of N
501  n_pert(n_id) = n_loc ! with value n_loc
502  end if
503  nr_m(n_id) = nr_m(n_id) + 1 ! one more M in either old or new N
504  m_pert(n_id,nr_m(n_id)) = m_loc ! with value m_loc
505  delta(n_id,nr_m(n_id),:) = delta_loc ! and perturbation amplitude for cos and sin with value delta_loc
506  end do
507 
508  if (pert_type.eq.1) close(hel_pert_file_i)
509  else
510  nr_n = 0
511  end if
512 
513  ! plot properties
514  plot_dim = [100,100]
515  plot_lims(:,1) = [0.0_dp,2.0_dp]
516  plot_lims(:,2) = [0.5_dp,2.0_dp]
517  flux_name = ['poloidal','toroidal']
518  call writo('Change plot properties from defaults?')
519  call lvl_ud(1)
520  do id = 1,2
521  call writo(trim(i2str(plot_dim(id)))//' '//flux_name(id)//&
522  &' points on range '//trim(r2strt(plot_lims(1,id)))//&
523  &' pi .. '//trim(r2strt(plot_lims(2,id)))//' pi')
524  end do
525  call lvl_ud(-1)
526  if (get_log(.false.)) then
527  call lvl_ud(1)
528  do id = 1,2
529  call writo('number of '//flux_name(id)//' points?')
530  plot_dim(id) = get_int(lim_lo=2)
531  call writo('lower limit of '//flux_name(id)//&
532  &' range [pi]?')
533  plot_lims(1,id) = get_real()
534  call writo('upper limit of '//flux_name(id)//&
535  &' range [pi]?')
536  plot_lims(2,id) = get_real()
537  end do
538  call lvl_ud(-1)
539  end if
540 
541  ! possibly include N = 0 for equilibrium if not already done so
542  if (.not.zero_n_pert) then ! N = 0 was not already included
543  jd_min = 2
544  nr_n = nr_n + 1
545  if (pert_eq) then
546  n_pert(nr_n) = 0
547  nr_m(nr_n) = 1
548  m_pert(nr_n,1) = 0
549  delta(nr_n,1,:) = 0
550  end if
551  else
552  jd_min = 1
553  end if
554 
555  ! sort and output
556  if (pert_eq) then
557  ! sort
558  allocate(m_pert_copy(size(m_pert,1),size(m_pert,2)))
559  allocate(delta_copy(size(delta,1),size(delta,2),size(delta,3)))
560  allocate(nr_m_copy(size(nr_m)))
561  m_pert_copy = m_pert
562  delta_copy = delta
563  nr_m_copy = nr_m
564  allocate(piv(nr_n))
565  call bubble_sort(n_pert(1:nr_n),piv)
566  do jd = 1,nr_n
567  nr_m(jd) = nr_m_copy(piv(jd))
568  m_pert(jd,:) = m_pert_copy(piv(jd),:)
569  delta(jd,:,:) = delta_copy(piv(jd),:,:)
570  !!write(*,*) 'jd', jd, nr_n
571  !!write(*,*) 'nr_m', nr_m(jd)
572  !!write(*,*) ' >> n', n_pert(jd)
573  !!write(*,*) ' >> m', m_pert(jd,1:nr_m(jd))
574  end do
575  deallocate(m_pert_copy)
576  deallocate(delta_copy)
577  deallocate(nr_m_copy)
578 
579  ! output
580  call writo('Summary of perturbation form:')
581  call lvl_ud(1)
582  plus = ''
583  do jd = jd_min,nr_n
584  do id = 1,nr_m(jd)
585  call writo(plus//&
586  &trim(r2strt(delta(jd,id,1)))//' cos('//&
587  &trim(i2str(m_pert(jd,id)))//' theta - '//&
588  &trim(i2str(n_pert(jd)))//' zeta) + '//&
589  &trim(r2strt(delta(jd,id,2)))//' sin('//&
590  &trim(i2str(m_pert(jd,id)))//' theta - '//&
591  &trim(i2str(n_pert(jd)))//' zeta)')
592  plus = '+ '
593  end do
594  end do
595  call lvl_ud(-1)
596  end if
597 
598  ! user output
599  call writo('Set up axisymmetric data')
600  call lvl_ud(1)
601 
602  ! Fourier transform of boundary R and Z
603  if (ias.eq.0) then ! symmetric (so nchi is odd)
604  n_b = nchi*2-2 ! -2 because of overlapping points at 0, pi
605  else ! asymmetric (so nchi is aumented by one)
606  n_b = nchi-1 ! -1 because of overlapping points at 0
607  end if
608  allocate(bh_0(n_b,2)) ! HELENA coords (no overlap at 0)
609  allocate(theta(n_b,2)) ! geometrical poloidal angle (overlap at 0)
610  if (ias.eq.0) then ! symmetric
611  bh_0(1:nchi,1) = r_h_loc(:,n_r_eq)
612  bh_0(1:nchi,2) = z_h_loc(:,n_r_eq)
613  theta(1:nchi,2) = chi_h
614  do kd = 1,nchi-2
615  bh_0(nchi+kd,1) = r_h_loc(nchi-kd,n_r_eq)
616  bh_0(nchi+kd,2) = -z_h_loc(nchi-kd,n_r_eq)
617  theta(nchi+kd,2) = 2*pi-chi_h(nchi-kd)
618  end do
619  else
620  bh_0(:,1) = r_h_loc(1:n_b-1,n_r_eq)
621  bh_0(:,2) = z_h_loc(1:n_b-1,n_r_eq)
622  theta(:,2) = chi_h(1:n_b-1)
623  end if
624  theta(:,1) = atan2(bh_0(:,2),bh_0(:,1)-r_h_loc(1,1))
625  where(theta(:,1).lt.0._dp) theta(:,1) = theta(:,1)+2*pi
626 
627  !!! TEMPORARILY
628  !!write(*,*) 'TEMPORARILY CIRCULAR TOKAMAK !!!!!!!!!!!'
629  !!theta(:,1) = theta(:,2)
630  !!BH_0(:,1) = 1.5_dp + 0.5*cos(theta(:,1))
631  !!BH_0(:,2) = 0.5*sin(theta(:,1))
632 
633  ! plot output
634  plot_name(1) = 'chi'
635  plot_title = ['theta_G','chi_H ']
636  call print_ex_2d(plot_title(1:2),plot_name(1),theta/pi,&
637  &x=reshape([theta(:,2),theta(:,2)],[n_b,2])/pi,&
638  &draw=.false.)
639  call draw_ex(plot_title(1:2),plot_name(1),2,1,.false.)
640 
641  ! calculate output for unperturbed R and Z
642  plot_name(1) = 'R_F'
643  plot_name(2) = 'Z_F'
644  do kd = 1,2
645  ! user output
646  call writo('analyzing '//trim(plot_name(kd)))
647  call lvl_ud(1)
648 
649  ! NUFFT
650  ierr = nufft(theta(:,1),bh_0(:,kd),b_f_loc,plot_name(kd))
651  chckerr('')
652  if (kd.eq.1) then
653  allocate(b_f(size(b_f_loc,1),-(nr_n-1):(nr_n-1),2,2)) ! (pol modes, tor modes, cos/sin (m theta), R/Z)
654  b_f = 0._dp
655  end if
656  b_f(:,0,:,kd) = b_f_loc
657 
658  call lvl_ud(-1)
659  end do
660 
661  ! plot axisymetric boundary in 3D
662  call plot_boundary(b_f(:,0:0,:,:),[0],'last_fs',plot_dim,plot_lims)
663 
664  call lvl_ud(-1)
665 
666  ! user output
667  if (pert_eq) then
668  call writo('Modify axisymmetric equilibrium')
669  call lvl_ud(1)
670  end if
671 
672  ! Calculate the normal unit vector on the HELENA (equidistant)
673  ! poloidal grid.
674  if (pert_eq) then
675  ! calculate unit normal vector by calculating first the Fourier
676  ! components in the Helena poloidal coordinate, and then using
677  ! them to obtain the poloidal derivative of R and Z. The normal
678  ! unit vector is then given by
679  ! (Z_theta e_R - R_theta e_Z)/sqrt(Z_theta^2 + R_theta^2)
680  allocate(bh_deriv(n_b,2)) ! theta derivative of BH
681  allocate(u_norm(n_b,2)) ! normalized unit vector: (Z_theta e_R - R_theta e_Z)/norm
682  bh_deriv = 0._dp
683  do kd = 1,2
684  ! NUFFT
685  ierr = nufft(theta(:,2),bh_0(:,kd),b_f_loc) ! HELENA pol. Fourier coefficients
686  chckerr('')
687 
688  ! calculate poloidal derivative using the Fourier series
689  do id = 0,size(b_f_loc,1)-1
690  bh_deriv(:,kd) = bh_deriv(:,kd) + id*(&
691  &b_f_loc(id+1,2)*cos(id*theta(:,2)) - &
692  &b_f_loc(id+1,1)*sin(id*theta(:,2)))
693  end do
694 
695 #if ldebug
696  if (debug_write_flux_q_in_file_for_vmec) then
697  allocate(bh_0_alt(size(bh_0,1)))
698 
699  call writo('Comparing R or Z with reconstruction &
700  &through Fourier coefficients')
701  bh_0_alt = 0._dp
702  do id = 0,size(b_f_loc,1)-1
703  bh_0_alt = bh_0_alt + &
704  &b_f_loc(id+1,1)*cos(id*theta(:,2)) + &
705  &b_f_loc(id+1,2)*sin(id*theta(:,2))
706  end do
707  call print_ex_2d(['orig BH','alt BH '],'',&
708  &reshape([bh_0(:,kd),bh_0_alt],[size(bh_0,1),2]),x=&
709  &reshape([theta(:,2),theta(:,2)],[size(bh_0,1),2]))
710 
711  call writo('Comparing derivative')
712  ierr = setup_deriv_data(theta(:,2),deriv_data,1,1)
713  chckerr('')
714  ierr = apply_disc(bh_0(:,kd),deriv_data,bh_0_alt)
715  chckerr('')
716  call deriv_data%dealloc()
717  call print_ex_2d(['orig BH','alt BH '],'',&
718  &reshape([bh_deriv(:,kd),bh_0_alt],&
719  &[size(bh_deriv,1),2]),x=&
720  &reshape([theta(:,2),theta(:,2)],&
721  &[size(bh_deriv,1),2]))
722 
723  deallocate(bh_0_alt)
724  end if
725 #endif
726  end do
727  u_norm(:,2) = sqrt(bh_deriv(:,1)**2 + bh_deriv(:,2)**2)
728  u_norm(:,1) = bh_deriv(:,2)/u_norm(:,2)
729  u_norm(:,2) = -bh_deriv(:,1)/u_norm(:,2)
730  deallocate(bh_deriv)
731  !!!call print_ex_2D(['test_normal'],'',&
732  !!!&transpose(reshape([BH_0(:,2)-u_norm(:,2)*0.1,BH_0(:,2),&
733  !!!&BH_0(:,2)+u_norm(:,2)*0.1],[size(BH_0,1),3])),x=&
734  !!!&transpose(reshape([BH_0(:,1)-u_norm(:,1)*0.1,BH_0(:,1),&
735  !!!&BH_0(:,1)+u_norm(:,1)*0.1],[size(BH_0,1),3])))
736  end if
737 
738  ! loop over all toroidal modes N and include the corresponding
739  ! perturbation, consisting of terms of the form:
740  ! delta_c cos(M theta - N zeta) + delta_s sin(M theta - N zeta) =
741  ! delta_c [cos(M theta)cos(N zeta) + sin(M theta) sin(N zeta) ] +
742  ! delta_s [sin(M theta)cos(N zeta) - cos(M theta) sin(N zeta) ],
743  ! where theta is in Helena straight-field line coordinates and zeta
744  ! corresponds to the geometrical toroidal angle.
745  ! The terms dependent on theta will shift up and down the Fourier
746  ! components of the axisymmetric R and Z, but the terms dependent on
747  ! zeta will not.
748  ! The final output should be on the geometrical poloidal grid, so to
749  ! calculate the Fourier components of the perturbed R and Z on this
750  ! geometrical poloidal grid interpolation from the HELENA poloidal
751  ! grid is necessary. This means that all multiplications with terms
752  ! ~ cos(M theta) and terms ~ sin(M theta) where theta is the HELENA
753  ! poloidal angle are performed first, before calculating the Fourier
754  ! modes in the geometrical poloidal grid through interpolation.
755  ! Note that the different poloidal modes for equal toroidal modes
756  ! are combined.
757  ! The resulting cosine and sine modes in the geometrical poloidal
758  ! angle are then be combined with the cosine and sine modes of N
759  ! zeta. The result will be a contribution to the terms cos(m theta
760  ! +/- N zeta) and sin(m theta +/- N zeta), described below.
761  pert_n: do jd = jd_min,nr_n
762  ! user output
763  call writo(trim(i2str(jd-jd_min+1))//'/'//&
764  &trim(i2str(nr_n-jd_min+1))//': N = '//&
765  &trim(i2str(n_pert(jd))))
766  call lvl_ud(1)
767 
768  ! calculate the modal content in geometrical poloidal angle of
769  ! the perturbation.
770  allocate(b_f_pert(size(b_f,1),2,2,2)) ! (pol modes, cos/sin (m theta), R/Z, cos/sin (N zeta))
771 
772  ! user output
773  call writo('Calculating contributions to cos('//&
774  &trim(i2str(n_pert(jd)))//' zeta):')
775  call lvl_ud(1)
776 
777  allocate(bh_pert(n_b,2)) ! perturbed BH
778  bh_pert = 0._dp
779  do kd = 1,nr_m(jd)
780  ! user output
781  call writo('term '//trim(r2strt(delta(jd,kd,1)))//&
782  &' cos('//trim(i2str(m_pert(jd,kd)))//' theta) + '//&
783  &trim(r2strt(delta(jd,kd,2)))//&
784  &' sin('//trim(i2str(m_pert(jd,kd)))//&
785  &' theta) contributes')
786  do id = 1,n_b
787  bh_pert(id,:) = bh_pert(id,:) + u_norm(id,:)*(&
788  &delta(jd,kd,1)*cos(m_pert(jd,kd)*theta(id,2)) + &
789  &delta(jd,kd,2)*sin(m_pert(jd,kd)*theta(id,2)))
790  end do
791  end do
792 
793  ! calculate the Fourier series of perturbed R and Z
794  plot_name(1) = 'R_F_pert_cos_'//trim(i2str(jd-jd_min+1))
795  plot_name(2) = 'Z_F_pert_cos_'//trim(i2str(jd-jd_min+1))
796  do kd = 1,2
797  ! NUFFT
798  ierr = nufft(theta(:,1),bh_pert(:,kd),b_f_loc,&
799  &plot_name(kd))
800  chckerr('')
801  b_f_pert(:,:,kd,1) = b_f_loc
802  end do
803  deallocate(bh_pert)
804 
805  call lvl_ud(-1)
806 
807  ! user output
808  call writo('Calculating contributions to sin('//&
809  &trim(i2str(n_pert(jd)))//' zeta):')
810  call lvl_ud(1)
811 
812  allocate(bh_pert(n_b,2)) ! perturbed BH
813  bh_pert = 0._dp
814  do kd = 1,nr_m(jd)
815  ! user output
816  call writo('term '//trim(r2strt(delta(jd,kd,1)))//&
817  &' sin('//trim(i2str(m_pert(jd,kd)))//' theta) - '//&
818  &trim(r2strt(delta(jd,kd,2)))//&
819  &' cos('//trim(i2str(m_pert(jd,kd)))//&
820  &' theta) contributes')
821  do id = 1,n_b
822  bh_pert(id,:) = bh_pert(id,:) + u_norm(id,:)*(&
823  &delta(jd,kd,1)*sin(m_pert(jd,kd)*theta(id,2)) - &
824  &delta(jd,kd,2)*cos(m_pert(jd,kd)*theta(id,2)))
825  end do
826  end do
827 
828  ! calculate the Fourier series of perturbed R and Z
829  plot_name(1) = 'R_F_pert_sin_'//trim(i2str(jd-jd_min+1))
830  plot_name(2) = 'Z_F_pert_sin_'//trim(i2str(jd-jd_min+1))
831  do kd = 1,2
832  ! NUFFT
833  ierr = nufft(theta(:,1),bh_pert(:,kd),b_f_loc,&
834  &plot_name(kd))
835  chckerr('')
836  b_f_pert(:,:,kd,2) = b_f_loc
837  end do
838  deallocate(bh_pert)
839 
840  call lvl_ud(-1)
841 
842  ! We now have the cos and sin factors in front of cos(N zeta)
843  ! and sin(N zeta). The four combinations combine to terms
844  ! cos(k theta +/- N zeta) and sin(k theta +/- N zeta)
845  ! note that the poloidal modes k are always positive and nonzero
846  ! whereas the toroidal mode numbers can be negative or positive.
847  ! Therefore, the terms that contribute to a positive N are:
848  ! - BC(:,N): 1/2 (alpha^c + beta^s)
849  ! - BS(:,N): 1/2 (alpha^s - beta^c)
850  ! - BC(:,-N): 1/2 (alpha^c - beta^s)
851  ! - BS(:,-N): 1/2 (alpha^s + beta^c)
852  ! where alpha^c and alpha^s result from the calculation with
853  ! cos(M theta) and beta^c and beta^s from sin(M theta).
854 
855  ! user output
856  call writo('Convert to contributions to')
857  call lvl_ud(1)
858  call writo(&
859  &'cos(k theta +/- '//trim(i2str(n_pert(jd)))//&
860  &' zeta) and sin(k theta +/- '//&
861  &trim(i2str(n_pert(jd)))//' zeta)')
862 
863  rz: do kd = 1,2
864  ! terms with N
865  b_f_loc(:,1) = &
866  &0.5_dp*(b_f_pert(:,1,kd,1)+b_f_pert(:,2,kd,2)) ! ~ cos, N
867  b_f_loc(:,2) = &
868  &0.5_dp*(b_f_pert(:,2,kd,1)-b_f_pert(:,1,kd,2)) ! ~ sin, N
869 
870  ! update total B_F
871  b_f(:,jd-1,:,kd) = b_f(:,jd-1,:,kd) + b_f_loc
872 
873  ! terms with -N
874  b_f_loc(:,1) = &
875  &0.5_dp*(b_f_pert(:,1,kd,1)-b_f_pert(:,2,kd,2)) ! ~ cos, -N
876  b_f_loc(:,2) = &
877  &0.5_dp*(b_f_pert(:,2,kd,1)+b_f_pert(:,1,kd,2)) ! ~ sin, -N
878 
879  ! update total B_F
880  b_f(:,-(jd-1),:,kd) = b_f(:,-(jd-1),:,kd) + b_f_loc
881  end do rz
882 
883  deallocate(b_f_pert)
884 
885  call lvl_ud(-1)
886  call lvl_ud(-1)
887  end do pert_n
888 
889  ! plot boundary in 3D
890  if (pert_eq) call plot_boundary(&
891  &b_f,n_pert(1:nr_n),'last_fs_pert',plot_dim,plot_lims)
892 
893  ! set up nfp
894  if (pert_eq) then
895  ! save greatest common denominator of N into nfp, excluding N=0
896  do jd = 2,nr_n
897  if (jd.eq.2) then
898  nfp = n_pert(jd)
899  else
900  nfp = gcd(nfp,n_pert(jd))
901  end if
902  end do
903  if (nfp.ne.0) then
904  n_pert = n_pert/nfp
905  else
906  nfp = 1
907  end if
908  else
909  nfp = 1
910  end if
911 
912  ! detect whether there is stellarator symmetry
913  stel_sym = .false.
914  if (maxval(abs(b_f(:,:,2,1)))/maxval(abs(b_f(:,:,1,1))) &
915  &.lt. m_tol .and. & ! R_s << R_c
916  maxval(abs(b_f(:,:,1,2)))/maxval(abs(b_f(:,:,2,2))) &
917  &.lt. m_tol) & ! R_c << Z_s
918  &stel_sym = .true.
919  if (stel_sym) then
920  call writo("The equilibrium configuration contains &
921  &stellarator symmetry")
922  else
923  call writo("The equilibrium configuration does not contain &
924  &stellarator symmetry")
925  end if
926 
927  ! find out how many poloidal modes would be necessary
928  rec_min_m = 1
929  norm_b_h(1) = maxval(abs(b_f(:,:,:,1)))
930  norm_b_h(2) = maxval(abs(b_f(:,:,:,2)))
931  do id = 1,size(b_f,1)
932  if (maxval(abs(b_f(id,:,:,1)/norm_b_h(1))).gt.m_tol .or. & ! for R
933  &maxval(abs(b_f(id,:,:,2)/norm_b_h(2))).gt.m_tol) & ! for Z
934  &rec_min_m = id
935  end do
936  call writo("Detected recommended number of poloidal modes: "//&
937  &trim(i2str(rec_min_m)))
938 
939  ! user output
940  if (pert_eq) then
941  call lvl_ud(-1)
942  end if
943 
944  ! user output
945  file_name = "input."//trim(eq_name)
946  if (pert_eq) then
947  if (pert_type.eq.1 .or. pert_type.eq.3) then
948  do jd = jd_min,nr_n
949  file_name = trim(file_name)//'_N'//&
950  &trim(i2str(n_pert(jd)))
951  do id = 1,nr_m(jd)
952  file_name = trim(file_name)//'M'//&
953  &trim(i2str(m_pert(jd,id)))
954  end do
955  end do
956  else
957  file_name = trim(file_name)//'_REALISTIC'
958  end if
959  end if
960  call writo('Generate VMEC input file "'//trim(file_name)//'"')
961  call writo('This can be used for VMEC porting')
962  call lvl_ud(1)
963 
964  ! output to VMEC input file
965  open(hel_export_file_i,status='replace',file=trim(file_name),&
966  &iostat=ierr)
967  chckerr('Failed to open file')
968 
969  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") "!----- General Parameters -----"
970  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") "&INDATA"
971  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") "MGRID_FILE = 'NONE',"
972  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") "PRECON_TYPE = 'GMRES'"
973  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") "PREC2D_THRESHOLD = 3.E-8"
974  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") "DELT = 1.00E+00,"
975  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") "NS_ARRAY = 19, 39, 79, 159, 319, &
976  &639"
977  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") "LRFP = F"
978  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A,L1)") "LASYM = ", .not.stel_sym
979  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") "LFREEB = F"
980  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") "NTOR = "//trim(i2str(nr_n-1)) ! -NTOR .. NTOR
981  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") "MPOL = "//trim(i2str(rec_min_m)) ! 0 .. MPOL-1
982  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") "TCON0 = 1"
983  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") "FTOL_ARRAY = 1.E-6, 1.E-6, 1.E-6, &
984  &1.E-6, 1.E-10, 2.000E-18, "
985  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") "NITER = 6000, NSTEP = 200,"
986  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") "NFP = "//trim(i2str(nfp))
987  if (use_normalization) then
988  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") "PHIEDGE = "//&
989  &trim(r2str(-flux_t_h(grid_eq%n(3),0)*psi_0))
990  else
991  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") "PHIEDGE = "//&
992  &trim(r2str(-flux_t_h(grid_eq%n(3),0)))
993  end if
994 
995  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") ""
996  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") ""
997 
998  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") "!----- Pressure Parameters -----"
999  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") "PMASS_TYPE = 'cubic_spline'"
1000  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") "GAMMA = 0.00000000000000E+00"
1001  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") ""
1002  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)",advance="no") "AM_AUX_S ="
1003  do kd = 1,grid_eq%n(3)
1004  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A1,ES23.16)") " ", &
1005  &flux_t_h(kd,0)/flux_t_h(grid_eq%n(3),0)
1006  end do
1007  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") ""
1008  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)",advance="no") "AM_AUX_F ="
1009  do kd = 1,grid_eq%n(3)
1010  if (use_normalization) then
1011  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A1,ES23.16)") " ", &
1012  &pres_h(kd,0)*pres_0
1013  else
1014  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A1,ES23.16)") " ", &
1015  &pres_h(kd,0)
1016  end if
1017  end do
1018 
1019  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") ""
1020  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") ""
1021 
1022  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") &
1023  &"!----- Current/Iota Parameters -----"
1024  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") "NCURR = 0"
1025  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") "PIOTA_TYPE = 'Cubic_spline'"
1026  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") ""
1027  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)",advance="no") "AI_AUX_S ="
1028  do kd = 1,grid_eq%n(3)
1029  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A1,ES23.16)") " ", &
1030  &flux_t_h(kd,0)/flux_t_h(grid_eq%n(3),0)
1031  end do
1032  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") ""
1033  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)",advance="no") "AI_AUX_F ="
1034  do kd = 1,grid_eq%n(3)
1035  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A1,ES23.16)") " ", -rot_t_h(kd,0)
1036  end do
1037 
1038  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") ""
1039  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") ""
1040 
1041  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") &
1042  &"!----- Boundary Shape Parameters -----"
1043  ierr = print_mode_numbers(hel_export_file_i,b_f(:,0,:,:),0)
1044  chckerr('')
1045  if (pert_eq) then
1046  do jd = 2,nr_n
1047  ierr = print_mode_numbers(hel_export_file_i,&
1048  &b_f(:,-(jd-1),:,:),-n_pert(jd))
1049  chckerr('')
1050  ierr = print_mode_numbers(hel_export_file_i,&
1051  &b_f(:,jd-1,:,:),n_pert(jd))
1052  chckerr('')
1053  end do
1054  end if
1055  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A,ES23.16)") "RAXIS = ", b_f(1,0,1,1)
1056  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A,ES23.16)") "ZAXIS = ", b_f(1,0,1,2)
1057  write(hel_export_file_i,"(A)") "&END"
1058 
1059  close(hel_export_file_i)
1060 
1061  ! user output
1062  call lvl_ud(-1)
1063 
1064  ! wait
1065  call pause_prog
1066  end function write_flux_q_in_file_for_vmec
1067 
1068  ! plots the boundary of a toroidal configuration
1069  subroutine plot_boundary(B,n,plot_name,plot_dim,plot_lims)
1070  ! input / output
1071  real(dp), intent(in) :: B(:,:,:,:) ! cosine and sine of fourier series
1072  integer, intent(in) :: n(:) ! toroidal mode numbers
1073  character(len=*), intent(in) :: plot_name ! name of plot
1074  integer, intent(in) :: plot_dim(2) ! plot dimensions
1075  real(dp), intent(in) :: plot_lims(2,2) ! limits of plot dimensions [pi]
1076 
1077  ! local variables
1078  real(dp), allocatable :: ang_plot(:,:,:) ! angles of plot (theta,zeta)
1079  real(dp), allocatable :: XYZ_plot(:,:,:) ! coordinates of boundary (X,Y,Z)
1080  integer :: kd, id ! counters
1081  integer :: id_loc ! local id
1082  integer :: n_F ! number of toroidal modes (given by n)
1083  integer :: n_F_loc ! local n_F
1084  integer :: m_F ! number of poloidal modes (including 0)
1085 
1086  ! set variables
1087  allocate(ang_plot(plot_dim(1),plot_dim(2),2)) ! theta and zeta
1088  allocate(xyz_plot(plot_dim(1),plot_dim(2),3)) ! X, Y and Z
1089  xyz_plot = 0._dp
1090  n_f = size(n)
1091  m_f = size(b,1)
1092 
1093  ! create grid
1094  do kd = 1,plot_dim(1)
1095  ang_plot(kd,:,1) = plot_lims(1,1) + (kd-1._dp)/(plot_dim(1)-1)*&
1096  &(plot_lims(2,1)-plot_lims(1,1))
1097  end do
1098  do kd = 1,plot_dim(2)
1099  ang_plot(:,kd,2) = plot_lims(1,2) + (kd-1._dp)/(plot_dim(2)-1)*&
1100  &(plot_lims(2,2)-plot_lims(1,2))
1101  end do
1102  ang_plot = ang_plot*pi
1103 
1104  ! inverse Fourier transform
1105  do id = 1,n_f ! toroidal modes
1106  do n_f_loc = -n(id),n(id),max(2*n(id),1) ! positive and negative N modes, no duplication at zero
1107  id_loc = n_f + (id-1)*n_f_loc/max(n(id),1)
1108  do kd = 0,m_f-1 ! poloidal modes
1109  ! R
1110  xyz_plot(:,:,1) = xyz_plot(:,:,1) + &
1111  &b(kd+1,id_loc,1,1)*cos(kd*ang_plot(:,:,1)-&
1112  &n_f_loc*ang_plot(:,:,2)) + &
1113  &b(kd+1,id_loc,2,1)*sin(kd*ang_plot(:,:,1)-&
1114  &n_f_loc*ang_plot(:,:,2))
1115  ! Z
1116  xyz_plot(:,:,3) = xyz_plot(:,:,3) + &
1117  &b(kd+1,id_loc,1,2)*cos(kd*ang_plot(:,:,1)-&
1118  &n_f_loc*ang_plot(:,:,2)) + &
1119  &b(kd+1,id_loc,2,2)*sin(kd*ang_plot(:,:,1)-&
1120  &n_f_loc*ang_plot(:,:,2))
1121  end do
1122  end do
1123  end do
1124 
1125  ! print cross-section (R,Z)
1126  call print_ex_2d(['cross_section_'//trim(plot_name)],&
1127  &'cross_section_'//trim(plot_name),xyz_plot(:,:,3),&
1128  &x=xyz_plot(:,:,1),draw=.false.)
1129  call draw_ex(['cross_section_'//trim(plot_name)],&
1130  &'cross_section_'//trim(plot_name),plot_dim(2),1,.false.)
1131  call print_ex_2d(['cross_section_'//trim(plot_name)//'_inv'],&
1132  &'cross_section_'//trim(plot_name)//'_inv',&
1133  &transpose(xyz_plot(:,:,3)),x=transpose(xyz_plot(:,:,1)),&
1134  &draw=.false.)
1135  call draw_ex(['cross_section_'//trim(plot_name)//'_inv'],&
1136  &'cross_section_'//trim(plot_name)//'_inv',plot_dim(1),1,&
1137  &.false.)
1138 
1139  ! convert to X, Y, Z
1140  xyz_plot(:,:,2) = xyz_plot(:,:,1)*sin(ang_plot(:,:,2))
1141  xyz_plot(:,:,1) = xyz_plot(:,:,1)*cos(ang_plot(:,:,2))
1142 
1143  ! print
1144  call print_ex_3d('plasma boundary',trim(plot_name),xyz_plot(:,:,3),&
1145  &x=xyz_plot(:,:,1),y=xyz_plot(:,:,2),draw=.false.)
1146  call draw_ex(['plasma boundary'],trim(plot_name),1,2,.true.)
1147  end subroutine plot_boundary
1148 
1149  ! print the mode numbers
1150  integer function print_mode_numbers(file_i,B,n_pert) result(ierr)
1151  character(*), parameter :: rout_name = 'print_mode_numbers'
1152 
1153  ! input / output
1154  integer, intent(in) :: file_i ! file to output flux quantities for VMEC export
1155  real(dp), intent(in) :: B(:,:,:) ! cosine and sine of fourier series for R and Z
1156  integer, intent(in) :: n_pert ! toroidal mode number
1157 
1158  ! local variables
1159  integer :: max_n_B_output = 101 ! max. nr. of modes written in output file (constant in VMEC)
1160  integer :: kd ! counter
1161  integer :: m ! counter
1162  character :: var_name ! name of variables (R or Z)
1163  character(len=2*max_str_ln) :: temp_output_str ! temporary output string
1164 
1165  ! initialize ierr
1166  ierr = 0
1167 
1168  do kd = 1,2 ! R and Z
1169  select case (kd)
1170  case (1)
1171  var_name = 'R'
1172  case (2)
1173  var_name = 'Z'
1174  case default
1175  var_name = '?'
1176  end select
1177 
1178  ! output to file
1179  do m = 0,min(size(b,1)-1,max_n_b_output)-1
1180  write(temp_output_str,"(' ',A,'BC(',I4,', ',I4,') = ',&
1181  &ES23.16,' ',A,'BS(',I4,', ',I4,') = ',ES23.16)") &
1182  &var_name,n_pert,m,b(m+1,1,kd), &
1183  &var_name,n_pert,m,b(m+1,2,kd)
1184  write(unit=file_i,fmt='(A)',iostat=ierr) &
1185  &trim(temp_output_str)
1186  chckerr('Failed to write')
1187  end do
1188  write(unit=file_i,fmt="(A)",iostat=ierr) ""
1189  chckerr('Failed to write')
1190  end do
1191  end function print_mode_numbers
1192 
1193  ! calculate the proportionality between toroidal ripple and
1194  ! perturbation
1195  subroutine calc_prop_b_tor(lim_r,prop_B_tor)
1196  use helena_vars, only: h_h_11, nchi, chi_h, ias, flux_p_h, q_saf_h
1197  use grid_vars, only: n_r_eq
1198 
1199  ! input / output
1200  integer, intent(in) :: lim_r(2) ! limits in r range for plot
1201  real(dp), intent(inout), allocatable :: prop_B_tor(:,:,:) ! proportionality between delta B_tor and delta_norm
1202 
1203  ! local variables
1204  integer :: nchi_2pi ! nr. of poloidal points in entire interval 0..2pi
1205  integer :: id, kd ! counters
1206  character(len=max_str_ln) :: file_name ! name of plot file
1207 
1208  if (ias.eq.0) then ! symmetric (so nchi is odd)
1209  nchi_2pi = nchi*2-2 ! -2 because of overlapping points at 0, pi
1210  else ! asymmetric (so nchi is aumented by one)
1211  nchi_2pi = nchi-1 ! -1 because of overlapping points at 0
1212  end if
1213  allocate(prop_b_tor(nchi_2pi,lim_r(2)-lim_r(1)+1,3))
1214 
1215  call writo('Fourier coefficients at normal positions')
1216  call lvl_ud(1)
1217  do kd = lim_r(1),lim_r(2)
1218  ! set up prop_B_tor, chi and normal coordinate
1219  if (ias.eq.0) then ! symmetric
1220  prop_b_tor(1:nchi,kd-lim_r(1)+1,1) = &
1221  &sqrt(h_h_11(:,kd))*q_saf_h(kd,1)/&
1222  &q_saf_h(kd,0)
1223  prop_b_tor(1:nchi,kd-lim_r(1)+1,2) = chi_h
1224  do id = 1,nchi-2
1225  prop_b_tor(nchi+id,kd-lim_r(1)+1,1) = &
1226  &sqrt(h_h_11(nchi-id,kd))*q_saf_h(kd,1)/&
1227  &q_saf_h(kd,0)
1228  prop_b_tor(nchi+id,kd-lim_r(1)+1,2) = &
1229  &2*pi-chi_h(nchi-id)
1230  end do
1231  else
1232  prop_b_tor(:,kd-lim_r(1)+1,1) = &
1233  &sqrt(h_h_11(1:nchi_2pi-1,kd))*q_saf_h(kd,1)/&
1234  &q_saf_h(kd,0)
1235  prop_b_tor(:,kd-lim_r(1)+1,2) = chi_h(1:nchi_2pi-1)
1236  end if
1237  prop_b_tor(:,kd-lim_r(1)+1,3) = &
1238  &flux_p_h(kd,0)/flux_p_h(n_r_eq,0)
1239  end do
1240  call lvl_ud(-1)
1241 
1242  call writo('D1B |nabla psi|: ')
1243  call lvl_ud(1)
1244  file_name = 'prop_B_tor_2D'
1245  call print_ex_2d([trim(file_name)],trim(file_name),&
1246  &transpose(reshape(&
1247  &[transpose(prop_b_tor(nchi_2pi/2+1:nchi_2pi,:,1)),&
1248  &transpose(prop_b_tor(1:nchi_2pi/2,:,1))],&
1249  &shape(transpose(prop_b_tor(:,:,1))))),&
1250  &x=transpose(reshape(&
1251  &[transpose(prop_b_tor(nchi_2pi/2+1:nchi_2pi,:,2))-2*pi,&
1252  &transpose(prop_b_tor(1:nchi_2pi/2,:,2))],&
1253  &shape(transpose(prop_b_tor(:,:,2))))),&
1254  &draw=.false.)
1255  call draw_ex([trim(file_name)],trim(file_name),&
1256  &size(prop_b_tor,2),1,.false.)
1257  file_name = 'prop_B_tor_3D'
1258  call print_ex_3d(trim(file_name),trim(file_name),&
1259  &transpose(reshape(&
1260  &[transpose(prop_b_tor(nchi_2pi/2+1:nchi_2pi,:,1)),&
1261  &transpose(prop_b_tor(1:nchi_2pi/2,:,1))],&
1262  &shape(transpose(prop_b_tor(:,:,1))))),&
1263  &x=transpose(reshape(&
1264  &[transpose(prop_b_tor(nchi_2pi/2+1:nchi_2pi,:,2))-2*pi,&
1265  &transpose(prop_b_tor(1:nchi_2pi/2,:,2))],&
1266  &shape(transpose(prop_b_tor(:,:,2))))),&
1267  &y=transpose(reshape(&
1268  &[transpose(prop_b_tor(nchi_2pi/2+1:nchi_2pi,:,3)),&
1269  &transpose(prop_b_tor(1:nchi_2pi/2,:,3))],&
1270  &shape(transpose(prop_b_tor(:,:,3))))),&
1271  &draw=.false.)
1272  call draw_ex([trim(file_name)],trim(file_name),1,2,.false.)
1273  call lvl_ud(-1)
1274  end subroutine calc_prop_b_tor
1275  end function calc_eq_1
1276  integer function calc_eq_2(grid_eq,eq_1,eq_2,dealloc_vars) result(ierr) ! metric version
1277  use num_vars, only: eq_style
1278  use num_utilities, only: derivs, c
1279  use eq_utilities, only: calc_inv_met, calc_f_derivs
1280  use vmec_utilities, only: calc_trigon_factors
1281 #if ldebug
1282  use num_vars, only: ltest
1283  use input_utilities, only: get_log, pause_prog
1284  use helena_ops, only: test_metrics_h
1285 #endif
1286 
1287  character(*), parameter :: rout_name = 'calc_eq_2'
1288 
1289  ! input / output
1290  type(grid_type), intent(inout) :: grid_eq ! equilibrium grid
1291  type(eq_1_type), intent(in) :: eq_1 ! metric equilibrium variables
1292  type(eq_2_type), intent(inout) :: eq_2 ! metric equilibrium variables
1293  logical, intent(in), optional :: dealloc_vars ! deallocate variables on the fly after writing
1294 
1295  ! local variables
1296  integer :: id
1297  integer :: pmone ! plus or minus one
1298  logical :: dealloc_vars_loc ! local dealloc_vars
1299 
1300  ! initialize ierr
1301  ierr = 0
1302 
1303  ! user output
1304  call writo('Start setting up metric equilibrium quantities')
1305 
1306  call lvl_ud(1)
1307 
1308  ! set up local dealloc_vars
1309  dealloc_vars_loc = .false.
1310  if (present(dealloc_vars)) dealloc_vars_loc = dealloc_vars
1311 
1312  ! create metric equilibrium variables
1313  call eq_2%init(grid_eq)
1314 
1315  ! do some preparations depending on equilibrium style used
1316  ! 1: VMEC
1317  ! 2: HELENA
1318  select case (eq_style)
1319  case (1) ! VMEC
1320  ! calculate the cylindrical variables R, Z and lambda and
1321  ! derivatives
1322  call writo('Calculate R,Z,L...')
1323  ierr = calc_trigon_factors(grid_eq%theta_E,grid_eq%zeta_E,&
1324  &grid_eq%trigon_factors)
1325  chckerr('')
1326  do id = 0,max_deriv+1
1327  ierr = calc_rzl(grid_eq,eq_2,derivs(id))
1328  chckerr('')
1329  end do
1330  case (2) ! HELENA
1331  ! do nothing
1332  end select
1333 
1334  ! Calcalations depending on equilibrium style being used:
1335  ! 1: VMEC
1336  ! 2: HELENA
1337  select case (eq_style)
1338  case (1) ! VMEC
1339  ! calculate the metrics in the cylindrical coordinate system
1340  call writo('Calculate g_C') ! h_C is not necessary
1341  do id = 0,max_deriv
1342  ierr = calc_g_c(eq_2,derivs(id))
1343  chckerr('')
1344  end do
1345 
1346  ! calculate the jacobian in the cylindrical coordinate system
1347  call writo('Calculate jac_C')
1348  do id = 0,max_deriv
1349  ierr = calc_jac_c(eq_2,derivs(id))
1350  chckerr('')
1351  end do
1352 
1353  ! calculate the transformation matrix C(ylindrical) -> V(MEC)
1354  call writo('Calculate T_VC')
1355  do id = 0,max_deriv
1356  ierr = calc_t_vc(eq_2,derivs(id))
1357  chckerr('')
1358  end do
1359 
1360  ! calculate the metric factors in the VMEC coordinate system
1361  call writo('Calculate g_V')
1362  do id = 0,max_deriv
1363  ierr = calc_g_v(eq_2,derivs(id))
1364  chckerr('')
1365  end do
1366 
1367  ! calculate the jacobian in the VMEC coordinate system
1368  call writo('Calculate jac_V')
1369  do id = 0,max_deriv
1370  ierr = calc_jac_v(eq_2,derivs(id))
1371  chckerr('')
1372  end do
1373 
1374 #if ldebug
1375  if (ltest) then
1376  call writo('Test calculation of g_V?')
1377  if(get_log(.false.)) then
1378  ierr = test_g_v(grid_eq,eq_2)
1379  chckerr('')
1380  call pause_prog
1381  end if
1382  call writo('Test calculation of jac_V?')
1383  if(get_log(.false.)) then
1384  ierr = test_jac_v(grid_eq,eq_2)
1385  chckerr('')
1386  call pause_prog
1387  end if
1388  end if
1389 #endif
1390 
1391  ! calculate the transformation matrix V(MEC) -> F(lux)
1392  call writo('Calculate T_VF')
1393  do id = 0,max_deriv
1394  ierr = calc_t_vf(grid_eq,eq_1,eq_2,derivs(id))
1395  chckerr('')
1396  end do
1397 
1398  ! set up plus minus one
1399  pmone = -1 ! conversion VMEC LH -> RH coord. system
1400 
1401  ! possibly deallocate
1402  if (dealloc_vars_loc) then
1403  deallocate(eq_2%R_E,eq_2%Z_E,eq_2%L_E)
1404  deallocate(eq_2%g_C,eq_2%jac_C)
1405  deallocate(eq_2%T_VC,eq_2%det_T_VC)
1406  end if
1407  case (2) ! HELENA
1408 #if ldebug
1409  if (ltest) then
1410  call writo('Test consistency of metric factors?')
1411  if(get_log(.false.,ind=.true.)) then
1412  ierr = test_metrics_h()
1413  chckerr('')
1414  call pause_prog(ind=.true.)
1415  end if
1416  end if
1417 #endif
1418 
1419  ! calculate the jacobian in the HELENA coordinate system
1420  call writo('Calculate jac_H')
1421  do id = 0,max_deriv
1422  ierr = calc_jac_h(grid_eq,eq_1,eq_2,derivs(id))
1423  chckerr('')
1424  end do
1425 
1426  ! calculate the metric factors in the HELENA coordinate system
1427  call writo('Calculate h_H')
1428  do id = 0,max_deriv
1429  ierr = calc_h_h(grid_eq,eq_2,derivs(id))
1430  chckerr('')
1431  end do
1432 
1433 #if ldebug
1434  if (ltest) then
1435  call writo('Test calculation of D1 D2 h_H?')
1436  if(get_log(.false.)) then
1437  ierr = test_d12h_h(grid_eq,eq_2)
1438  chckerr('')
1439  call pause_prog
1440  end if
1441  end if
1442 #endif
1443 
1444  ! calculate the inverse g_H of the metric factors h_H
1445  call writo('Calculate g_H')
1446  do id = 0,max_deriv
1447  ierr = calc_inv_met(eq_2%g_E,eq_2%h_E,derivs(id))
1448  chckerr('')
1449  end do
1450 
1451  ! calculate the transformation matrix H(ELENA) -> F(lux)
1452  call writo('Calculate T_HF')
1453  do id = 0,max_deriv
1454  ierr = calc_t_hf(grid_eq,eq_1,eq_2,derivs(id))
1455  chckerr('')
1456  end do
1457 
1458  ! set up plus minus one
1459  pmone = 1
1460 
1461  ! possibly deallocate
1462  if (dealloc_vars_loc) then
1463  deallocate(eq_2%h_E)
1464  end if
1465  end select
1466 
1467 #if ldebug
1468  if (ltest) then
1469  call writo('Test calculation of T_EF?')
1470  if(get_log(.false.)) then
1471  ierr = test_t_ef(grid_eq,eq_1,eq_2)
1472  chckerr('')
1473  call pause_prog
1474  end if
1475  end if
1476 #endif
1477 
1478  ! calculate the inverse of the transformation matrix T_EF
1479  call writo('Calculate T_FE')
1480  do id = 0,max_deriv
1481  ierr = calc_inv_met(eq_2%T_FE,eq_2%T_EF,derivs(id))
1482  chckerr('')
1483  ierr = calc_inv_met(eq_2%det_T_FE,eq_2%det_T_EF,derivs(id))
1484  chckerr('')
1485  end do
1486 
1487  ! calculate the metric factors in the Flux coordinate system
1488  call writo('Calculate g_F')
1489  do id = 0,max_deriv
1490  ierr = calc_g_f(eq_2,derivs(id))
1491  chckerr('')
1492  end do
1493 
1494  ! calculate the inverse h_F of the metric factors g_F
1495  call writo('Calculate h_F')
1496  do id = 0,max_deriv
1497  ierr = calc_inv_met(eq_2%h_F,eq_2%g_F,derivs(id))
1498  chckerr('')
1499  end do
1500 
1501  ! calculate the jacobian in the Flux coordinate system
1502  call writo('Calculate jac_F')
1503  do id = 0,max_deriv
1504  ierr = calc_jac_f(eq_2,derivs(id))
1505  chckerr('')
1506  end do
1507 
1508  !!! limit Jacobian to small value to avoid infinities
1509  !!if (maxval(eq_2%jac_F(:,:,:,0,0,0)).gt.0._dp) then
1510  !!eq_2%jac_F(:,:,:,0,0,0) = max(eq_2%jac_F(:,:,:,0,0,0),tol_zero)
1511  !!else
1512  !!eq_2%jac_F(:,:,:,0,0,0) = min(eq_2%jac_F(:,:,:,0,0,0),-tol_zero)
1513  !!end if
1514 
1515  ! possibly deallocate
1516  if (dealloc_vars_loc) then
1517  deallocate(eq_2%g_E,eq_2%jac_E)
1518  end if
1519 
1520  ! Transform metric equilibrium E into F derivatives
1521  ierr = calc_f_derivs(eq_2)
1522  chckerr('')
1523 
1524  ! possibly deallocate
1525  if (dealloc_vars_loc) then
1526  deallocate(eq_2%g_F,eq_2%h_F,eq_2%jac_F)
1527  deallocate(eq_2%T_EF,eq_2%T_FE,eq_2%det_T_EF,eq_2%det_T_FE)
1528  end if
1529 
1530  ! Calculate derived metric quantities
1531  call calc_derived_q(grid_eq,eq_1,eq_2)
1532 
1533 #if ldebug
1534  if (ltest) then
1535  call writo('Test Jacobian in Flux coordinates?')
1536  if(get_log(.false.)) then
1537  ierr = test_jac_f(grid_eq,eq_1,eq_2)
1538  chckerr('')
1539  call pause_prog
1540  end if
1541  call writo('Test calculation of B_F?')
1542  if(get_log(.false.)) then
1543  ierr = test_b_f(grid_eq,eq_1,eq_2)
1544  chckerr('')
1545  call pause_prog
1546  end if
1547  call writo('Test consistency with given pressure?')
1548  if(get_log(.false.)) then
1549  ierr = test_p(grid_eq,eq_1,eq_2)
1550  chckerr('')
1551  call pause_prog
1552  end if
1553  end if
1554 #endif
1555 
1556  call lvl_ud(-1)
1557 
1558  call writo('Done setting up metric equilibrium quantities')
1559  end function calc_eq_2

1624  ! plots the flux quantities in HDF5
1625  integer function flux_q_plot_hdf5() result(ierr)
1626  use num_vars, only: eq_style
1627  use output_ops, only: plot_hdf5
1628  use grid_utilities, only: calc_xyz_grid, extend_grid_f, trim_grid
1629  use vmec_utilities, only: calc_trigon_factors
1630 
1631  character(*), parameter :: rout_name = 'flux_q_plot_HDF5'
1632 
1633  ! local variables
1634  integer :: kd ! counter
1635  real(dp), allocatable :: X_plot(:,:,:,:) ! x values of total plot
1636  real(dp), allocatable :: Y_plot(:,:,:,:) ! y values of total plot
1637  real(dp), allocatable :: Z_plot(:,:,:,:) ! z values of total plot
1638  real(dp), allocatable :: f_plot(:,:,:,:) ! values of variable of total plot
1639  integer :: plot_dim(4) ! total plot dimensions
1640  integer :: plot_offset(4) ! plot offset
1641  type(grid_type) :: grid_plot ! grid for plotting
1642  character(len=max_str_ln) :: file_name ! file name
1643 
1644  ! initialize ierr
1645  ierr = 0
1646 
1647  ! set up file name
1648  file_name = 'flux_quantities'
1649 
1650  ! fill the 2D version of the plot
1651  allocate(y_plot_2d(grid_trim%loc_n_r,n_vars))
1652 
1653  y_plot_2d(:,1) = eq%q_saf_FD(norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0)
1654  y_plot_2d(:,2) = eq%rot_t_FD(norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0)
1655  y_plot_2d(:,3) = eq%pres_FD(norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0)
1656  y_plot_2d(:,4) = eq%flux_p_FD(norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0)
1657  y_plot_2d(:,5) = eq%flux_t_FD(norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0)
1658 
1659  ! extend trimmed equilibrium grid
1660  ierr = extend_grid_f(grid_trim,grid_plot,grid_eq=grid_eq)
1661  chckerr('')
1662 
1663  ! if VMEC, calculate trigonometric factors of plot grid
1664  if (eq_style.eq.1) then
1665  ierr = calc_trigon_factors(grid_plot%theta_E,grid_plot%zeta_E,&
1666  &grid_plot%trigon_factors)
1667  chckerr('')
1668  end if
1669 
1670  ! set up plot_dim and plot_offset
1671  plot_dim = [grid_plot%n(1),grid_plot%n(2),grid_plot%n(3),n_vars]
1672  plot_offset = [0,0,grid_plot%i_min-1,n_vars]
1673 
1674  ! set up total plot variables
1675  allocate(x_plot(grid_plot%n(1),grid_plot%n(2),grid_plot%loc_n_r,&
1676  &n_vars))
1677  allocate(y_plot(grid_plot%n(1),grid_plot%n(2),grid_plot%loc_n_r,&
1678  &n_vars))
1679  allocate(z_plot(grid_plot%n(1),grid_plot%n(2),grid_plot%loc_n_r,&
1680  &n_vars))
1681  allocate(f_plot(grid_plot%n(1),grid_plot%n(2),grid_plot%loc_n_r,&
1682  &n_vars))
1683 
1684  ! calculate 3D X,Y and Z
1685  ierr = calc_xyz_grid(grid_eq,grid_plot,x_plot(:,:,:,1),&
1686  &y_plot(:,:,:,1),z_plot(:,:,:,1))
1687  chckerr('')
1688  do id = 2,n_vars
1689  x_plot(:,:,:,id) = x_plot(:,:,:,1)
1690  y_plot(:,:,:,id) = y_plot(:,:,:,1)
1691  z_plot(:,:,:,id) = z_plot(:,:,:,1)
1692  end do
1693 
1694  do kd = 1,grid_plot%loc_n_r
1695  f_plot(:,:,kd,1) = y_plot_2d(kd,1) ! safey factor
1696  f_plot(:,:,kd,2) = y_plot_2d(kd,2) ! rotational transform
1697  f_plot(:,:,kd,3) = y_plot_2d(kd,3) ! pressure
1698  f_plot(:,:,kd,4) = y_plot_2d(kd,4) ! poloidal flux
1699  f_plot(:,:,kd,5) = y_plot_2d(kd,5) ! toroidal flux
1700  end do
1701 
1702  ! rescale if normalized
1703  if (use_normalization) then
1704  f_plot(:,:,:,3) = f_plot(:,:,:,3)*pres_0 ! pressure
1705  f_plot(:,:,:,4) = f_plot(:,:,:,4)*psi_0 ! flux_p
1706  f_plot(:,:,:,5) = f_plot(:,:,:,5)*psi_0 ! flux_t
1707  end if
1708 
1709  ! print the output using HDF5
1710  call plot_hdf5(plot_titles,file_name,f_plot,plot_dim,plot_offset,&
1711  &x_plot,y_plot,z_plot,col=1,description='Flux quantities')
1712 
1713  ! deallocate and destroy grid
1714  deallocate(y_plot_2d)
1715  deallocate(x_plot,y_plot,z_plot,f_plot)
1716  call grid_plot%dealloc()
1717  end function flux_q_plot_hdf5

1719  ! plots the pressure and fluxes in external program
1720  integer function flux_q_plot_ex() result(ierr)
1721  use eq_vars, only: max_flux_f
1722 
1723  character(*), parameter :: rout_name = 'flux_q_plot_ex'
1724 
1725  ! local variables
1726  character(len=max_str_ln), allocatable :: file_name(:) ! file_name
1727  real(dp), allocatable :: ser_var_loc(:) ! local serial var
1728 
1729  ! initialize ierr
1730  ierr = 0
1731 
1732  ! allocate variabels if master
1733  if (rank.eq.0) then
1734  allocate(x_plot_2d(grid_trim%n(3),n_vars))
1735  allocate(y_plot_2d(grid_trim%n(3),n_vars))
1736  end if
1737 
1738  ! fill the 2D version of the plot
1739  ierr = get_ser_var(eq%q_saf_FD(norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0),ser_var_loc)
1740  chckerr('')
1741  if (rank.eq.0) y_plot_2d(:,1) = ser_var_loc
1742  ierr = get_ser_var(eq%rot_t_FD(norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0),ser_var_loc)
1743  chckerr('')
1744  if (rank.eq.0) y_plot_2d(:,2) = ser_var_loc
1745  ierr = get_ser_var(eq%pres_FD(norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0),ser_var_loc)
1746  chckerr('')
1747  if (rank.eq.0) y_plot_2d(:,3) = ser_var_loc
1748  ierr = get_ser_var(eq%flux_p_FD(norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0),&
1749  &ser_var_loc)
1750  chckerr('')
1751  if (rank.eq.0) y_plot_2d(:,4) = ser_var_loc
1752  ierr = get_ser_var(eq%flux_t_FD(norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0),&
1753  &ser_var_loc)
1754  chckerr('')
1755  if (rank.eq.0) y_plot_2d(:,5) = ser_var_loc
1756 
1757  ! rescale if normalized
1758  if (use_normalization .and. rank.eq.0) then
1759  y_plot_2d(:,3) = y_plot_2d(:,3)*pres_0 ! pressure
1760  y_plot_2d(:,4) = y_plot_2d(:,4)*psi_0 ! flux_p
1761  y_plot_2d(:,5) = y_plot_2d(:,5)*psi_0 ! flux_t
1762  end if
1763 
1764  ! continue the plot if master
1765  if (rank.eq.0) then
1766  ! deallocate local serial variables
1767  deallocate(ser_var_loc)
1768 
1769  ! set up file names
1770  allocate(file_name(2))
1771  file_name(1) = 'pres'
1772  file_name(2) = 'flux'
1773 
1774  ! 2D normal variable (normalized F coordinate)
1775  x_plot_2d(:,1) = grid_trim%r_F*2*pi/max_flux_f
1776  do id = 2,n_vars
1777  x_plot_2d(:,id) = x_plot_2d(:,1)
1778  end do
1779 
1780  ! plot the individual 2D output of this process (except q_saf
1781  ! and rot_t, as they are already in plot_resonance)
1782  call print_ex_2d(plot_titles(3),file_name(1),&
1783  &y_plot_2d(:,3),x_plot_2d(:,3),draw=.false.)
1784  ! fluxes
1785  call print_ex_2d(plot_titles(4:5),file_name(2),&
1786  &y_plot_2d(:,4:5),x_plot_2d(:,4:5),draw=.false.)
1787 
1788  ! draw plot
1789  call draw_ex(plot_titles(3:3),file_name(1),1,1,.false.) ! pressure
1790  call draw_ex(plot_titles(4:5),file_name(2),2,1,.false.) ! fluxes
1791 
1792  ! user output
1793  call writo('Safety factor and rotational transform are plotted &
1794  &using "plot_resonance"')
1795 
1796  ! clean up
1797  deallocate(x_plot_2d,y_plot_2d)
1798  end if
1799  end function flux_q_plot_ex
1800  end function flux_q_plot
1801 
1802  ! calculate R, Z and Lambda and derivatives in VMEC coordinates at the
1803  ! grid points given by the variables theta_E and zeta_E (contained in
1804  ! trigon_factors) and at every normal point. The derivatives are indicated
1805  ! by the variable "deriv" which has 3 indices
1806  ! Note: There is no HELENA equivalent because for HELENA simulations, R and
1807  ! Z are not necessary for calculation of the metric coefficients, and L does
1808  ! not exist.
1809  integer function calc_rzl_ind(grid,eq,deriv) result(ierr)
1810  use vmec_utilities, only: fourier2real
1811  use vmec_vars, only: r_v_c, r_v_s, z_v_c, z_v_s, l_v_c, l_v_s, is_asym_v
1812  use num_utilities, only: check_deriv
1813  use num_vars, only: max_deriv
1814 
1815  character(*), parameter :: rout_name = 'calc_RZL_ind'
1816 
1817  ! input / output
1818  type(grid_type), intent(in) :: grid ! grid for which to prepare the trigonometric factors
1819  type(eq_2_type), intent(inout) :: eq ! metric equilibrium
1820  integer, intent(in) :: deriv(3) ! derivatives
1821 
1822  ! initialize ierr
1823  ierr = 0
1824 
1825  ! check the derivatives requested
1826  ierr = check_deriv(deriv,max_deriv+1,'calc_RZL')
1827  chckerr('')
1828 
1829  ! calculate the variables R,Z and their angular derivative
1830  ierr = fourier2real(r_v_c(:,grid%i_min:grid%i_max,deriv(1)),&
1831  &r_v_s(:,grid%i_min:grid%i_max,deriv(1)),grid%trigon_factors,&
1832  &eq%R_E(:,:,:,deriv(1),deriv(2),deriv(3)),sym=[.true.,is_asym_v],&
1833  &deriv=[deriv(2),deriv(3)])
1834  chckerr('')
1835  ierr = fourier2real(z_v_c(:,grid%i_min:grid%i_max,deriv(1)),&
1836  &z_v_s(:,grid%i_min:grid%i_max,deriv(1)),grid%trigon_factors,&
1837  &eq%Z_E(:,:,:,deriv(1),deriv(2),deriv(3)),sym=[is_asym_v,.true.],&
1838  &deriv=[deriv(2),deriv(3)])
1839  chckerr('')
1840  ierr = fourier2real(l_v_c(:,grid%i_min:grid%i_max,deriv(1)),&
1841  &l_v_s(:,grid%i_min:grid%i_max,deriv(1)),grid%trigon_factors,&
1842  &eq%L_E(:,:,:,deriv(1),deriv(2),deriv(3)),sym=[is_asym_v,.true.],&
1843  &deriv=[deriv(2),deriv(3)])
1844  chckerr('')
1845  end function calc_rzl_ind
1846  integer function calc_rzl_arr(grid,eq,deriv) result(ierr)
1847  character(*), parameter :: rout_name = 'calc_RZL_arr'
1848 
1849  ! input / output
1850  type(grid_type), intent(in) :: grid ! grid for which to prepare the trigonometric factors
1851  type(eq_2_type), intent(inout) :: eq ! metric equilibrium
1852  integer, intent(in) :: deriv(:,:)
1853 
1854  ! local variables
1855  integer :: id
1856 
1857  ! initialize ierr
1858  ierr = 0
1859 
1860  do id = 1, size(deriv,2)
1861  ierr = calc_rzl_ind(grid,eq,deriv(:,id))
1862  chckerr('')
1863  end do
1864  end function calc_rzl_arr
1865 
1866  ! calculate the lower metric elements in the C(ylindrical) coordinate system
1867  integer function calc_g_c_ind(eq,deriv) result(ierr)
1868  use num_utilities, only: add_arr_mult, c
1869 
1870  character(*), parameter :: rout_name = 'calc_g_C_ind'
1871 
1872  ! input / output
1873  type(eq_2_type), intent(inout) :: eq ! metric equilibrium
1874  integer, intent(in) :: deriv(:)
1875 
1876  ! initialize ierr
1877  ierr = 0
1878 
1879  ! check the derivatives requested
1880  ierr = check_deriv(deriv,max_deriv,'calc_g_C')
1881  chckerr('')
1882 
1883  ! initialize
1884  eq%g_C(:,:,:,:,deriv(1),deriv(2),deriv(3)) = 0._dp
1885 
1886  ! calculate
1887  if (sum(deriv).eq.0) then
1888  eq%g_C(:,:,:,c([1,1],.true.),deriv(1),deriv(2),deriv(3)) = 1.0_dp
1889  eq%g_C(:,:,:,c([3,3],.true.),deriv(1),deriv(2),deriv(3)) = 1.0_dp
1890  end if
1891  ierr = add_arr_mult(eq%R_E,eq%R_E,&
1892  &eq%g_C(:,:,:,c([2,2],.true.),deriv(1),deriv(2),deriv(3)),deriv)
1893  chckerr('')
1894  end function calc_g_c_ind
1895  integer function calc_g_c_arr(eq,deriv) result(ierr)
1896  character(*), parameter :: rout_name = 'calc_g_C_arr'
1897 
1898  ! input / output
1899  type(eq_2_type), intent(inout) :: eq ! metric equilibrium
1900  integer, intent(in) :: deriv(:,:)
1901 
1902  ! local variables
1903  integer :: id
1904 
1905  ! initialize ierr
1906  ierr = 0
1907 
1908  do id = 1, size(deriv,2)
1909  ierr = calc_g_c_ind(eq,deriv(:,id))
1910  chckerr('')
1911  end do
1912  end function calc_g_c_arr
1913 
1914  ! calculate the metric coefficients in the equilibrium V(MEC) coordinate
1915  ! system using the metric coefficients in the C(ylindrical) coordinate
1916  ! system and the transformation matrices
1917  ! NOTE: It is assumed that the lower order derivatives have been calculated
1918  ! already. If not, the results will be incorrect!
1919  integer function calc_g_v_ind(eq,deriv) result(ierr)
1920  use num_vars, only: max_deriv
1921  use eq_utilities, only: calc_g
1922 
1923  character(*), parameter :: rout_name = 'calc_g_V_ind'
1924 
1925  ! input / output
1926  type(eq_2_type), intent(inout) :: eq ! metric equilibrium
1927  integer, intent(in) :: deriv(:)
1928 
1929  ! initialize ierr
1930  ierr = 0
1931 
1932  ! check the derivatives requested
1933  ierr = check_deriv(deriv,max_deriv,'calc_g_V')
1934  chckerr('')
1935 
1936  ierr = calc_g(eq%g_C,eq%T_VC,eq%g_E,deriv,max_deriv)
1937  chckerr('')
1938  end function calc_g_v_ind
1939  integer function calc_g_v_arr(eq,deriv) result(ierr)
1940  character(*), parameter :: rout_name = 'calc_g_V_arr'
1941 
1942  ! input / output
1943  type(eq_2_type), intent(inout) :: eq ! metric equilibrium
1944  integer, intent(in) :: deriv(:,:)
1945 
1946  ! local variables
1947  integer :: id
1948 
1949  ! initialize ierr
1950  ierr = 0
1951 
1952  do id = 1, size(deriv,2)
1953  ierr = calc_g_v_ind(eq,deriv(:,id))
1954  chckerr('')
1955  end do
1956  end function calc_g_v_arr
1957 
1958  ! calculate the metric coefficients in the equilibrium H(ELENA) coordinate
1959  ! system using the HELENA output
1960  ! Note: the derivatives are done using finite differences, which means that
1961  ! the first and last points of the normal grid have a higher error. This
1962  ! could be remedied by choosing the interval larger. Currently, this is not
1963  ! done automatically.
1964  integer function calc_h_h_ind(grid,eq,deriv) result(ierr)
1965  use num_vars, only: max_deriv, norm_disc_prec_eq
1966  use helena_vars, only: h_h_11, h_h_12, h_h_33
1967  use num_utilities, only: c
1968  use grid_utilities, only: setup_deriv_data, apply_disc
1969 
1970  character(*), parameter :: rout_name = 'calc_h_H_ind'
1971 
1972  ! input / output
1973  type(grid_type), intent(in) :: grid ! grid
1974  type(eq_2_type), intent(inout) :: eq ! metric equilibrium
1975  integer, intent(in) :: deriv(:)
1976 
1977  ! local variables
1978  character(len=max_str_ln) :: err_msg ! error message
1979  integer :: jd, kd ! counters
1980  type(disc_type) :: norm_deriv_data ! data for normal derivatives
1981  type(disc_type) :: ang_deriv_data ! data for angular derivatives
1982 
1983  ! initialize ierr
1984  ierr = 0
1985 
1986  ! check the derivatives requested
1987  ierr = check_deriv(deriv,max_deriv,'calc_h_H')
1988  chckerr('')
1989 
1990  ! initialize
1991  eq%h_E(:,:,:,:,deriv(1),deriv(2),deriv(3)) = 0._dp
1992 
1993  if (deriv(3).ne.0) then ! axisymmetry: deriv. in tor. coord. is zero
1994  !eq%h_E(:,:,:,:,deriv(1),deriv(2),deriv(3)) = 0.0_dp
1995  else if (sum(deriv).eq.0) then ! no derivatives
1996  do jd = 1,grid%n(2)
1997  eq%h_E(:,jd,:,c([1,1],.true.),0,0,0) = &
1998  &h_h_11(:,grid%i_min:grid%i_max)
1999  eq%h_E(:,jd,:,c([1,2],.true.),0,0,0) = &
2000  &h_h_12(:,grid%i_min:grid%i_max)
2001  eq%h_E(:,jd,:,c([3,3],.true.),0,0,0) = &
2002  &h_h_33(:,grid%i_min:grid%i_max)
2003  eq%h_E(:,jd,:,c([2,2],.true.),0,0,0) = &
2004  &1._dp/h_h_11(:,grid%i_min:grid%i_max) * &
2005  &(1._dp/(eq%jac_E(:,jd,:,0,0,0)**2*&
2006  &h_h_33(:,grid%i_min:grid%i_max)) + &
2007  &h_h_12(:,grid%i_min:grid%i_max)**2)
2008  end do
2009  else if (deriv(1).eq.1 .and. deriv(2).eq.0) then ! derivative in norm. coord.
2010  ierr = setup_deriv_data(grid%loc_r_E,norm_deriv_data,1,&
2011  &norm_disc_prec_eq+1) ! use extra precision to later calculate mixed derivatives
2012  chckerr('')
2013  ierr = apply_disc(eq%h_E(:,:,:,:,0,0,0),norm_deriv_data,&
2014  &eq%h_E(:,:,:,:,1,0,0),3)
2015  chckerr('')
2016  call norm_deriv_data%dealloc()
2017  else if (deriv(1).eq.2 .and. deriv(2).eq.0) then ! 2nd derivative in norm. coord.
2018  ierr = setup_deriv_data(grid%loc_r_E,norm_deriv_data,2,&
2019  &norm_disc_prec_eq)
2020  chckerr('')
2021  ierr = apply_disc(eq%h_E(:,:,:,:,0,0,0),norm_deriv_data,&
2022  &eq%h_E(:,:,:,:,2,0,0),3)
2023  chckerr('')
2024  call norm_deriv_data%dealloc()
2025  else if (deriv(1).eq.0 .and. deriv(2).eq.1) then ! derivative in pol. coord.
2026  do kd = 1,grid%loc_n_r
2027  do jd = 1,grid%n(2)
2028  ierr = setup_deriv_data(grid%theta_E(:,jd,kd),&
2029  &ang_deriv_data,1,norm_disc_prec_eq+1) ! use extra precision to later calculate mixed derivatives
2030  chckerr('')
2031  ierr = apply_disc(eq%h_E(:,jd,kd,:,0,0,0),&
2032  &ang_deriv_data,eq%h_E(:,jd,kd,:,0,1,0),1)
2033  chckerr('')
2034  end do
2035  end do
2036  call ang_deriv_data%dealloc()
2037  else if (deriv(1).eq.0 .and. deriv(2).eq.2) then ! 2nd derivative in pol. coord.
2038  do kd = 1,grid%loc_n_r
2039  do jd = 1,grid%n(2)
2040  ierr = setup_deriv_data(grid%theta_E(:,jd,kd),&
2041  &ang_deriv_data,2,norm_disc_prec_eq)
2042  chckerr('')
2043  ierr = apply_disc(eq%h_E(:,jd,kd,:,0,0,0),&
2044  &ang_deriv_data,eq%h_E(:,jd,kd,:,0,2,0),1)
2045  chckerr('')
2046  end do
2047  end do
2048  call ang_deriv_data%dealloc()
2049  else if (deriv(1).eq.1 .and. deriv(2).eq.1) then ! mixed derivative in norm. and pol. coord.
2050  ierr = setup_deriv_data(grid%loc_r_E,norm_deriv_data,1,&
2051  &norm_disc_prec_eq+1) ! use extra precision to later calculate mixed derivatives
2052  chckerr('')
2053  ierr = apply_disc(eq%h_E(:,:,:,:,0,1,0),norm_deriv_data,&
2054  &eq%h_E(:,:,:,:,1,1,0),3)
2055  chckerr('')
2056  call norm_deriv_data%dealloc()
2057  else
2058  ierr = 1
2059  err_msg = 'Derivative of order ('//trim(i2str(deriv(1)))//','//&
2060  &trim(i2str(deriv(2)))//','//trim(i2str(deriv(3)))//'&
2061  &) not supported'
2062  chckerr(err_msg)
2063  end if
2064  end function calc_h_h_ind

2212  ! calculate the jacobian in HELENA coordinates directly from J = q R^2/F
2213  ! NOTE: It is assumed that the lower order derivatives have been calculated
2214  ! already. If not, the results will be incorrect!
2215  integer function calc_jac_h_ind(grid,eq_1,eq_2,deriv) result(ierr)
2216  use num_vars, only: norm_disc_prec_eq
2217  use helena_vars, only: h_h_33, rbphi_h
2218  use grid_utilities, only: setup_deriv_data, apply_disc
2219 
2220  character(*), parameter :: rout_name = 'calc_jac_H_ind'
2221 
2222  ! input / output
2223  type(grid_type), intent(in) :: grid ! grid
2224  type(eq_1_type), intent(in) :: eq_1 ! flux equilibrium
2225  type(eq_2_type), intent(inout) :: eq_2 ! metric equilibrium
2226  integer, intent(in) :: deriv(:)
2227 
2228  ! local variables
2229  integer :: jd, kd ! counters
2230  character(len=max_str_ln) :: err_msg ! error message
2231  type(disc_type) :: norm_deriv_data ! data for normal derivatives
2232  type(disc_type) :: ang_deriv_data ! data for angular derivatives
2233 
2234  ! initialize ierr
2235  ierr = 0
2236 
2237  ! check the derivatives requested
2238  ierr = check_deriv(deriv,max_deriv,'calc_J_H')
2239  chckerr('')
2240 
2241  ! calculate determinant
2242  if (deriv(3).ne.0) then ! axisymmetry: deriv. in tor. coord. is zero
2243  eq_2%jac_E(:,:,:,deriv(1),deriv(2),deriv(3)) = 0.0_dp
2244  else if (sum(deriv).eq.0) then ! no derivatives
2245  do kd = 1,grid%loc_n_r
2246  do jd = 1,grid%n(2)
2247  eq_2%jac_E(:,jd,kd,0,0,0) = eq_1%q_saf_E(kd,0)/&
2248  &(h_h_33(:,grid%i_min-1+kd)*rbphi_h(grid%i_min-1+kd))
2249  end do
2250  end do
2251  else if (deriv(1).eq.1 .and. deriv(2).eq.0) then ! derivative in norm. coord.
2252  ierr = setup_deriv_data(grid%loc_r_E,norm_deriv_data,1,&
2253  &norm_disc_prec_eq+1) ! use extra precision to later calculate mixed derivatives
2254  chckerr('')
2255  ierr = apply_disc(eq_2%jac_E(:,:,:,0,0,0),norm_deriv_data,&
2256  &eq_2%jac_E(:,:,:,1,0,0),3)
2257  chckerr('')
2258  call norm_deriv_data%dealloc()
2259  else if (deriv(1).eq.2 .and. deriv(2).eq.0) then ! 2nd derivative in norm. coord.
2260  ierr = setup_deriv_data(grid%loc_r_E,norm_deriv_data,2,&
2261  &norm_disc_prec_eq)
2262  chckerr('')
2263  ierr = apply_disc(eq_2%jac_E(:,:,:,0,0,0),norm_deriv_data,&
2264  &eq_2%jac_E(:,:,:,2,0,0),3)
2265  chckerr('')
2266  call norm_deriv_data%dealloc()
2267  else if (deriv(1).eq.0 .and. deriv(2).eq.1) then ! derivative in pol. coord.
2268  do kd = 1,grid%loc_n_r
2269  do jd = 1,grid%n(2)
2270  ierr = setup_deriv_data(grid%theta_E(:,jd,kd),&
2271  &ang_deriv_data,1,norm_disc_prec_eq+1) ! use extra precision to later calculate mixed derivatives
2272  chckerr('')
2273  ierr = apply_disc(eq_2%jac_E(:,jd,kd,0,0,0),&
2274  &ang_deriv_data,eq_2%jac_E(:,jd,kd,0,1,0))
2275  chckerr('')
2276  end do
2277  end do
2278  call ang_deriv_data%dealloc()
2279  else if (deriv(1).eq.0 .and. deriv(2).eq.2) then ! 2nd derivative in pol. coord.
2280  do kd = 1,grid%loc_n_r
2281  do jd = 1,grid%n(2)
2282  ierr = setup_deriv_data(grid%theta_E(:,jd,kd),&
2283  &ang_deriv_data,2,norm_disc_prec_eq)
2284  chckerr('')
2285  ierr = apply_disc(eq_2%jac_E(:,jd,kd,0,0,0),&
2286  &ang_deriv_data,eq_2%jac_E(:,jd,kd,0,2,0))
2287  chckerr('')
2288  end do
2289  end do
2290  call ang_deriv_data%dealloc()
2291  else if (deriv(1).eq.1 .and. deriv(2).eq.1) then ! mixed derivative in norm. and pol. coord.
2292  ierr = setup_deriv_data(grid%loc_r_E,norm_deriv_data,1,&
2293  &norm_disc_prec_eq+1) ! use extra precision to later calculate mixed derivatives
2294  chckerr('')
2295  ierr = apply_disc(eq_2%jac_E(:,:,:,0,1,0),norm_deriv_data,&
2296  &eq_2%jac_E(:,:,:,1,1,0),3)
2297  chckerr('')
2298  call norm_deriv_data%dealloc()
2299  else
2300  ierr = 1
2301  err_msg = 'Derivative of order ('//trim(i2str(deriv(1)))//','//&
2302  &trim(i2str(deriv(2)))//','//trim(i2str(deriv(3)))//'&
2303  &) not supported'
2304  chckerr(err_msg)
2305  end if
2306  end function calc_jac_h_ind
2307  integer function calc_jac_h_arr(grid,eq_1,eq_2,deriv) result(ierr)
2308  character(*), parameter :: rout_name = 'calc_jac_H_arr'
2309 
2310  ! input / output
2311  type(grid_type), intent(in) :: grid ! grid
2312  type(eq_1_type), intent(in) :: eq_1 ! flux equilibrium
2313  type(eq_2_type), intent(inout) :: eq_2 ! metric equilibrium
2314  integer, intent(in) :: deriv(:,:)

2320  ierr = 0
2321

2323  ierr = calc_jac_h_ind(grid,eq_1,eq_2,deriv(:,id))

2375  ! calculate the transformation matrix between C(ylindrical) and V(mec)
2376  ! coordinate system
2377  integer function calc_t_vc_ind(eq,deriv) result(ierr)
2378  use num_utilities, only: add_arr_mult, c
2379 
2380  character(*), parameter :: rout_name = 'calc_T_VC_ind'
2381 
2382  ! input / output
2383  type(eq_2_type), intent(inout) :: eq ! metric equilibrium
2384  integer, intent(in) :: deriv(:)
2385 
2386  ! check the derivatives requested
2387  ierr = check_deriv(deriv,max_deriv,'calc_T_VC')
2388  chckerr('')
2389 
2390  ! initialize
2391  eq%T_VC(:,:,:,:,deriv(1),deriv(2),deriv(3)) = 0._dp
2392 
2393  ! calculate transformation matrix T_V^C
2394  eq%T_VC(:,:,:,c([1,1],.false.),deriv(1),deriv(2),deriv(3)) = &
2395  &eq%R_E(:,:,:,deriv(1)+1,deriv(2),deriv(3))
2396  !eq%T_VC(:,:,:,c([1,2],.false.),deriv(1),deriv(2),deriv(3)) = 0
2397  eq%T_VC(:,:,:,c([1,3],.false.),deriv(1),deriv(2),deriv(3)) = &
2398  &eq%Z_E(:,:,:,deriv(1)+1,deriv(2),deriv(3))
2399  eq%T_VC(:,:,:,c([2,1],.false.),deriv(1),deriv(2),deriv(3)) = &
2400  &eq%R_E(:,:,:,deriv(1),deriv(2)+1,deriv(3))
2401  !eq%T_VC(:,:,:,c([2,2],.false.),deriv(1),deriv(2),deriv(3)) = 0
2402  eq%T_VC(:,:,:,c([2,3],.false.),deriv(1),deriv(2),deriv(3)) = &
2403  &eq%Z_E(:,:,:,deriv(1),deriv(2)+1,deriv(3))
2404  eq%T_VC(:,:,:,c([3,1],.false.),deriv(1),deriv(2),deriv(3)) = &
2405  &eq%R_E(:,:,:,deriv(1),deriv(2),deriv(3)+1)
2406  if (sum(deriv).eq.0) then
2407  eq%T_VC(:,:,:,c([3,2],.false.),deriv(1),deriv(2),deriv(3)) = 1.0_dp
2408  else
2409  !eq%T_VC(:,:,:,c([3,2],.false.),deriv(1),deriv(2),deriv(3)) = 0
2410  end if
2411  eq%T_VC(:,:,:,c([3,3],.false.),deriv(1),deriv(2),deriv(3)) = &
2412  &eq%Z_E(:,:,:,deriv(1),deriv(2),deriv(3)+1)
2413 
2414  ! determinant
2415  eq%det_T_VC(:,:,:,deriv(1),deriv(2),deriv(3)) = 0.0_dp
2416  ierr = add_arr_mult(eq%R_E(:,:,:,0:,1:,0:),eq%Z_E(:,:,:,1:,0:,0:),&
2417  &eq%det_T_VC(:,:,:,deriv(1),deriv(2),deriv(3)),deriv)
2418  chckerr('')
2419  ierr = add_arr_mult(-eq%R_E(:,:,:,1:,0:,0:),eq%Z_E(:,:,:,0:,1:,0:),&
2420  &eq%det_T_VC(:,:,:,deriv(1),deriv(2),deriv(3)),deriv)
2421  chckerr('')
2422  end function calc_t_vc_ind
