4709  ! performs tests on Jacobian in Flux coordinates
4710  ! - comparing it with the determinant of g_F
4711  ! - comparing it with the direct formula
4712  integer function test_jac_f(grid_eq,eq_1,eq_2) result(ierr)
4713  use num_vars, only: eq_style, use_pol_flux_f
4714  use grid_utilities, only: trim_grid
4715  use num_utilities, only: calc_det
4716  use helena_vars, only: h_h_33, rbphi_h
4717 
4718  character(*), parameter :: rout_name = 'test_jac_F'
4719 
4720  ! input / output
4721  type(grid_type), intent(in) :: grid_eq ! equilibrium grid
4722  type(eq_1_type), intent(in), target :: eq_1 ! flux equilibrium
4723  type(eq_2_type), intent(in) :: eq_2 ! metric equilibrium
4724 
4725  ! local variables
4726  integer :: norm_id(2) ! untrimmed normal indices for trimmed grids
4727  real(dp), allocatable :: res(:,:,:) ! result variable
4728  integer :: jd, kd ! counters
4729  character(len=max_str_ln) :: file_name ! name of plot file
4730  character(len=max_str_ln) :: description ! description of plot
4731  integer :: tot_dim(3), loc_offset(3) ! total dimensions and local offset
4732  type(grid_type) :: grid_trim ! trimmed equilibrium grid
4733  real(dp), pointer :: Dflux(:) => null() ! points to D flux_p or D flux_t in E coordinates
4734  integer :: pmone ! plus or minus one
4735 
4736  ! initialize ierr
4737  ierr = 0
4738 
4739  ! output
4740  call writo('Going to test the calculation of the Jacobian in Flux &
4741  &coordinates')
4742  call lvl_ud(1)
4743 
4744  ! trim extended grid into plot grid
4745  ierr = trim_grid(grid_eq,grid_trim,norm_id)
4746  chckerr('')
4747 
4748  ! set up res
4749  allocate(res(grid_trim%n(1),grid_trim%n(2),grid_trim%loc_n_r))
4750 
4751  ! set total and local dimensions and local offset
4752  tot_dim = [grid_trim%n(1),grid_trim%n(2),grid_trim%n(3)]
4753  loc_offset = [0,0,grid_trim%i_min-1]
4754 
4755  ! 1. Compare with determinant of g_F
4756 
4757  ! calculate Jacobian from determinant of g_F
4758  ierr = calc_det(res,eq_2%g_F(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),:,0,0,0),3)
4759  chckerr('')
4760 
4761  ! set some variables
4762  file_name = 'TEST_jac_F_1'
4763  description = 'Testing whether the Jacobian in Flux coordinates is &
4764  &consistent with determinant of metric matrix'
4765 
4766  ! plot difference
4767  call plot_diff_hdf5(res(:,:,:),&
4768  &eq_2%jac_F(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,0,0)**2,&
4769  &file_name,tot_dim,loc_offset,description,output_message=.true.)
4770 
4771  ! 2. Compare with explicit formula
4772 
4773  ! set up Dflux and pmone
4774  if (use_pol_flux_f) then ! using poloidal flux
4775  dflux => eq_1%flux_p_E(:,1)
4776  pmone = 1 ! flux_p_V = flux_p_F
4777  else
4778  dflux => eq_1%flux_t_E(:,1)
4779  pmone = -1 ! flux_t_V = - flux_t_F
4780  end if
4781 
4782  ! calculate jac_F
4783  ! choose which equilibrium style is being used:
4784  ! 1: VMEC
4785  ! 2: HELENA
4786  select case (eq_style)
4787  case (1) ! VMEC
4788  do kd = norm_id(1),norm_id(2)
4789  res(:,:,kd-norm_id(1)+1) = pmone * 2*pi * &
4790  &eq_2%R_E(:,:,kd,0,0,0)*&
4791  &(eq_2%R_E(:,:,kd,1,0,0)*eq_2%Z_E(:,:,kd,0,1,0) - &
4792  &eq_2%Z_E(:,:,kd,1,0,0)*eq_2%R_E(:,:,kd,0,1,0)) / &
4793  &(dflux(kd)*(1+eq_2%L_E(:,:,kd,0,1,0)))
4794  end do
4795  case (2) ! HELENA
4796  do kd = norm_id(1),norm_id(2)
4797  do jd = 1,grid_trim%n(2)
4798  res(:,jd,kd-norm_id(1)+1) = eq_1%q_saf_E(kd,0)/&
4799  &(h_h_33(:,kd+grid_eq%i_min-1)*&
4800  &rbphi_h(kd+grid_eq%i_min-1)) ! h_H_33 = 1/R^2 and RBphi_H = F are tabulated in eq. grid
4801  end do
4802  end do
4803  end select
4804 
4805  ! set some variables
4806  file_name = 'TEST_jac_F_2'
4807  description = 'Testing whether the Jacobian in Flux coordinates is &
4808  &consistent with explicit formula'
4809 
4810  ! plot difference
4811  call plot_diff_hdf5(res(:,:,:),&
4812  &eq_2%jac_F(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,0,0),file_name,tot_dim,&
4813  &loc_offset,description,output_message=.true.)
4814 
4815  ! clean up
4816  nullify(dflux)
4817  call grid_trim%dealloc()
4818 
4819  ! user output
4820  call lvl_ud(-1)
4821  call writo('Test complete')
4822  end function test_jac_f
4823 
4824  ! Tests whether g_V is calculated correctly
4825  integer function test_g_v(grid_eq,eq) result(ierr)
4826  use grid_utilities, only: trim_grid
4827  use num_utilities, only: c
4828 
4829  character(*), parameter :: rout_name = 'test_g_V'
4830 
4831  ! input / output
4832  type(grid_type), intent(in) :: grid_eq ! equilibrium grid
4833  type(eq_2_type), intent(in) :: eq ! metric equilibrium
4834 
4835  ! local variables
4836  integer :: norm_id(2) ! untrimmed normal indices for trimmed grids
4837  integer :: id, kd ! counters
4838  real(dp), allocatable :: res(:,:,:,:) ! result variable
4839  character(len=max_str_ln) :: file_name ! name of plot file
4840  character(len=max_str_ln) :: description ! description of plot
4841  integer :: tot_dim(3), loc_offset(3) ! total dimensions and local offset
4842  type(grid_type) :: grid_trim ! trimmed equilibrium grid
4843 
4844  ! initialize ierr
4845  ierr = 0
4846 
4847  ! output
4848  call writo('Going to test whether g_V is calculated correctly')
4849  call lvl_ud(1)
4850 
4851  ! trim extended grid into plot grid
4852  ierr = trim_grid(grid_eq,grid_trim,norm_id)
4853  chckerr('')
4854 
4855  ! set up res
4856  allocate(res(grid_trim%n(1),grid_trim%n(2),grid_trim%loc_n_r,6))
4857 
4858  ! set total and local dimensions and local offset
4859  tot_dim = [grid_trim%n(1),grid_trim%n(2),grid_trim%n(3)]
4860  loc_offset = [0,0,grid_trim%i_min-1]
4861 
4862  ! calculate g_V(1,1)
4863  res(:,:,:,1) = eq%R_E(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),1,0,0)**2 + &
4864  &eq%Z_E(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),1,0,0)**2
4865  ! calculate g_V(2,1)
4866  res(:,:,:,2) = eq%R_E(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),1,0,0)*&
4867  &eq%R_E(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,1,0) + &
4868  &eq%Z_E(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),1,0,0)*&
4869  &eq%Z_E(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,1,0)
4870  ! calculate g_V(3,1)
4871  res(:,:,:,3) = eq%R_E(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),1,0,0)*&
4872  &eq%R_E(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,0,1) + &
4873  &eq%Z_E(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),1,0,0)*&
4874  &eq%Z_E(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,0,1)
4875  ! calculate g_V(2,2)
4876  res(:,:,:,4) = eq%R_E(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,1,0)**2 + &
4877  &eq%Z_E(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,1,0)**2
4878  ! calculate g_V(3,2)
4879  res(:,:,:,5) = eq%R_E(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,1,0)*&
4880  &eq%R_E(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,0,1) + &
4881  &eq%Z_E(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,1,0)*&
4882  &eq%Z_E(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,0,1)
4883  ! calculate g_V(3,3)
4884  res(:,:,:,6) = eq%R_E(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,0,1)**2 + &
4885  &eq%Z_E(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,0,1)**2 + &
4886  &eq%R_E(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,0,0)**2
4887 
4888  ! set up plot variables for calculated values
4889  do id = 1,3
4890  do kd = 1,3
4891  ! user output
4892  call writo('Testing g_V('//trim(i2str(kd))//','//&
4893  &trim(i2str(id))//')')
4894  call lvl_ud(1)
4895 
4896  ! set some variables
4897  file_name = 'TEST_g_V_'//trim(i2str(kd))//'_'//trim(i2str(id))
4898  description = 'Testing calculated with given value for g_V('//&
4899  &trim(i2str(kd))//','//trim(i2str(id))//')'
4900 
4901  ! plot difference
4902  call plot_diff_hdf5(res(:,:,:,c([kd,id],.true.)),&
4903  &eq%g_E(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),c([kd,id],.true.),&
4904  &0,0,0),file_name,tot_dim,loc_offset,description,&
4905  &output_message=.true.)
4906 
4907  call lvl_ud(-1)
4908  end do
4909  end do
4910 
4911  ! clean up
4912  call grid_trim%dealloc()
4913 
4914  ! user output
4915  call lvl_ud(-1)
4916  call writo('Test complete')
4917  end function test_g_v

4919  ! Tests whether jac_V is calculated correctly
4920  integer function test_jac_v(grid_eq,eq) result(ierr)
4921  use grid_utilities, only: trim_grid, nufft
4922  use vmec_utilities, only: fourier2real
4923  use input_utilities, only: get_int, get_log
4924  use vmec_vars, only: jac_v_c, jac_v_s, is_asym_v
4925  use num_vars, only: rank, n_procs, max_deriv
4926 
4927  character(*), parameter :: rout_name = 'test_jac_V'
4928 
4929  ! input / output
4930  type(grid_type), intent(in) :: grid_eq ! equilibrium grid
4931  type(eq_2_type), intent(in) :: eq ! metric equilibrium
4932 
4933  ! local variables
4934  integer :: norm_id(2) ! untrimmed normal indices for trimmed grids
4935  integer :: norm_id_f(2) ! norm_id transposed to full grid
4936  integer :: deriv(2) ! angular derivatives
4937  logical :: done ! done
4938  logical :: do_NUFFT ! do the NUFFT
4939  real(dp), allocatable :: res(:,:,:) ! result variable
4940  real(dp), allocatable :: F(:,:) ! fourier components
4941  character(len=max_str_ln) :: file_name ! name of plot file
4942  character(len=max_str_ln) :: description ! description of plot
4943  integer :: tot_dim(3), loc_offset(3) ! total dimensions and local offset
4944  type(grid_type) :: grid_trim ! trimmed equilibrium grid
4945 
4946  ! initialize ierr
4947  ierr = 0
4948 
4949  ! output
4950  call writo('Going to test whether the Jacobian in the VMEC &
4951  &coords. jac_V is calculated correctly')
4952  call lvl_ud(1)
4953 
4954  ! trim extended grid into plot grid
4955  ierr = trim_grid(grid_eq,grid_trim,norm_id)
4956  chckerr('')
4957 
4958  ! set norm_id_f for quantities tabulated on full grid
4959  norm_id_f = grid_eq%i_min+norm_id-1
4960 
4961  ! set total and local dimensions and local offset
4962  tot_dim = [grid_trim%n(1),grid_trim%n(2),grid_trim%n(3)]
4963  loc_offset = [0,0,grid_trim%i_min-1]
4964 
4965  ! set up res
4966  allocate(res(grid_trim%n(1),grid_trim%n(2),grid_trim%loc_n_r))
4967 
4968  ! set some variables
4969  description = 'Testing calculated with given value for jac_V'
4970 
4971  done = .false.
4972  do while (.not.done)
4973  call writo('derivative in theta_E?')
4974  deriv(1) = get_int(lim_lo=0,lim_hi=max_deriv)
4975 
4976  call writo('derivative in zeta_E?')
4977  deriv(2) = get_int(lim_lo=0,lim_hi=max_deriv)
4978 
4979  ! get jac_V from VMEC
4980  ierr = fourier2real(jac_v_c(:,norm_id_f(1):norm_id_f(2)),&
4981  &jac_v_s(:,norm_id_f(1):norm_id_f(2)),&
4982  &grid_eq%trigon_factors(:,:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),:),&
4983  &res,sym=[.true.,is_asym_v],deriv=deriv)
4984  chckerr('')
4985 
4986  ! plot difference
4987  file_name = 'TEST_jac_V'
4988  call plot_diff_hdf5(res(:,:,:),&
4989  &eq%jac_E(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,deriv(1),deriv(2)),&
4990  &file_name,tot_dim,loc_offset,description,output_message=.true.)
4991 
4992  ! calculate NUFFT
4993  call writo('Calculate NUFFT?')
4994  do_nufft = get_log(.false.)
4995  if (do_nufft .and. rank.eq.n_procs-1) then
4996  call print_ex_2d('VMEC last surface','VMEC_lf',&
4997  &res(:,1,grid_trim%loc_n_r),&
4998  &x=grid_trim%theta_E(:,1,grid_trim%loc_n_r))
4999  call print_ex_2d('PB3D last surface','PB3D_lf',&
5000  &eq%jac_E(:,1,grid_eq%loc_n_r,0,0,0),&
5001  &x=grid_eq%theta_E(:,1,grid_eq%loc_n_r))
5002 
5003  ierr = nufft(grid_trim%theta_E(:,1,grid_trim%loc_n_r),&
5004  &res(:,1,grid_trim%loc_n_r),f,plot_name='VMEC')
5005  chckerr('')
5006  deallocate(f)
5007  ierr = nufft(grid_eq%theta_E(:,1,grid_eq%loc_n_r),&
5008  &eq%jac_E(:,1,grid_eq%loc_n_r,0,0,0),f,plot_name='PB3D')
5009  chckerr('')
5010  deallocate(f)
5011  end if
5012 
5013  call writo('Repeat?')
5014  done = .not.get_log(.true.)
5015  end do
5016 
5017  ! clean up
5018  call grid_trim%dealloc()
5019 
5020  ! user output
5021  call lvl_ud(-1)
5022  call writo('Test complete')
5023  end function test_jac_v
5024 
5025  ! Tests whether B_F is calculated correctly
5026  integer function test_b_f(grid_eq,eq_1,eq_2) result(ierr)
5027  use num_vars, only: eq_style
5028  use grid_utilities, only: trim_grid
5029  use num_utilities, only: c
5030  use vmec_utilities, only: fourier2real
5031  use vmec_vars, only: b_v_sub_s, b_v_sub_c, b_v_c, b_v_s, is_asym_v
5032 
5033  character(*), parameter :: rout_name = 'test_B_F'
5034 
5035  ! input / output
5036  type(grid_type), intent(in) :: grid_eq ! equilibrium grid
5037  type(eq_1_type), intent(in) :: eq_1 ! flux equilibrium
5038  type(eq_2_type), intent(in) :: eq_2 ! metric equilibrium
5039 
5040  ! local variables
5041  integer :: norm_id(2) ! untrimmed normal indices for trimmed grids
5042  integer :: norm_id_f(2) ! norm_id transposed to full grid
5043  integer :: id, kd ! counters
5044  real(dp), allocatable :: res(:,:,:,:) ! result variable
5045  real(dp), allocatable :: res2(:,:,:,:) ! result variable
5046  character(len=max_str_ln) :: file_name ! name of plot file
5047  character(len=max_str_ln) :: description ! description of plot
5048  integer :: tot_dim(3), loc_offset(3) ! total dimensions and local offset
5049  type(grid_type) :: grid_trim ! trimmed equilibrium grid
5050 
5051  ! initialize ierr
5052  ierr = 0
5053 
5054  ! output
5055  call writo('Going to test whether the magnetic field is calculated &
5056  &correctly')
5057  call lvl_ud(1)
5058 
5059  ! trim extended grid into plot grid
5060  ierr = trim_grid(grid_eq,grid_trim,norm_id)
5061  chckerr('')
5062 
5063  ! set norm_id_f for quantities tabulated on full grid
5064  norm_id_f = grid_eq%i_min+norm_id-1
5065 
5066  ! set up res and res2
5067  allocate(res(grid_trim%n(1),grid_trim%n(2),grid_trim%loc_n_r,4))
5068  allocate(res2(grid_trim%n(1),grid_trim%n(2),grid_trim%loc_n_r,4))
5069 
5070  ! set total and local dimensions and local offset
5071  tot_dim = [grid_trim%n(1),grid_trim%n(2),grid_trim%n(3)]
5072  loc_offset = [0,0,grid_trim%i_min-1]
5073 
5074  ! get covariant components and magnitude of B_E
5075  ! choose which equilibrium style is being used:
5076  ! 1: VMEC
5077  ! 2: HELENA
5078  select case (eq_style)
5079  case (1) ! VMEC
5080  do id = 1,3
5081  ierr = fourier2real(&
5082  &b_v_sub_c(:,norm_id_f(1):norm_id_f(2),id),&
5083  &b_v_sub_s(:,norm_id_f(1):norm_id_f(2),id),&
5084  &grid_eq%trigon_factors(:,:,:,norm_id(1):&
5085  &norm_id(2),:),res(:,:,:,id))
5086  chckerr('')
5087  end do
5088  ierr = fourier2real(b_v_c(:,norm_id_f(1):norm_id_f(2)),&
5089  &b_v_s(:,norm_id_f(1):norm_id_f(2)),&
5090  &grid_eq%trigon_factors(:,:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),:),&
5091  &res(:,:,:,4),[.true.,is_asym_v])
5092  chckerr('')
5093  case (2) ! HELENA
5094  res(:,:,:,1) = &
5095  &eq_2%g_E(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),c([1,2],.true.),0,0,0)
5096  res(:,:,:,2) = &
5097  &eq_2%g_E(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),c([2,2],.true.),0,0,0)
5098  do kd = norm_id(1),norm_id(2)
5099  res(:,:,kd-norm_id(1)+1,3) = eq_1%q_saf_E(kd,0)*&
5100  &eq_2%g_E(:,:,kd,c([3,3],.true.),0,0,0)
5101  res(:,:,kd-norm_id(1)+1,4) = &
5102  &sqrt(eq_2%g_E(:,:,kd,c([2,2],.true.),0,0,0) + &
5103  &eq_1%q_saf_E(kd,0)**2*&
5104  &eq_2%g_E(:,:,kd,c([3,3],.true.),0,0,0))
5105  end do
5106  do id = 1,4
5107  do kd = norm_id(1),norm_id(2)
5108  res(:,:,kd-norm_id(1)+1,id) = &
5109  &res(:,:,kd-norm_id(1)+1,id)/&
5110  &eq_2%jac_E(:,:,kd,0,0,0)
5111  end do
5112  end do
5113  end select
5114 
5115  ! transform them to Flux coord. system
5116  res2 = 0._dp
5117  do id = 1,3
5118  do kd = 1,3
5119  res2(:,:,:,id) = res2(:,:,:,id) + &
5120  &res(:,:,:,kd) * eq_2%T_FE(:,:,norm_id(1):&
5121  &norm_id(2),c([id,kd],.false.),0,0,0)
5122  end do
5123  end do
5124  res2(:,:,:,4) = res(:,:,:,4)
5125 
5126  ! set up plot variables for calculated values
5127  do id = 1,4
5128  ! user output
5129  if (id.lt.4) then
5130  call writo('Testing B_F_'//trim(i2str(id)))
5131  else
5132  call writo('Testing B_F')
5133  end if
5134  call lvl_ud(1)
5135 
5136  ! set some variables
5137  if (id.lt.4) then
5138  file_name = 'TEST_B_F_'//trim(i2str(id))
5139  description = 'Testing calculated with given value for B_F_'//&
5140  &trim(i2str(id))
5141  else
5142  file_name = 'TEST_B_F'
5143  description = 'Testing calculated with given value for B_F'
5144  end if
5145 
5146  ! plot difference
5147  if (id.lt.4) then
5148  call plot_diff_hdf5(res2(:,:,:,id),&
5149  &eq_2%g_F(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),c([3,id],.true.),0,0,0)&
5150  &/eq_2%jac_F(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,0,0),file_name,&
5151  &tot_dim,loc_offset,description,output_message=.true.)
5152  else
5153  call plot_diff_hdf5(res2(:,:,:,id),sqrt(&
5154  &eq_2%g_F(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),c([3,3],.true.),0,0,0))&
5155  &/eq_2%jac_F(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,0,0),file_name,&
5156  &tot_dim,loc_offset,description,output_message=.true.)
5157  end if
5158 
5159  call lvl_ud(-1)
5160  end do
5161 
5162  ! clean up
5163  call grid_trim%dealloc()
5164 
5165  ! user output
5166  call lvl_ud(-1)
5167  call writo('Test complete')
5168  end function test_b_f
5169 
5170  ! performs tests on pressure balance
5171  ! - mu_0 D2p = 1/J (D3 B_2 - D2 B_3)
5172  ! - mu_0 J D3p = 0 => D3 B_1 = D1 B_3
5173  ! (working in the (modified) Flux coordinates (alpha,psi,theta)_F)
5174  integer function test_p(grid_eq,eq_1,eq_2) result(ierr)
5175  use num_utilities, only: c
5176  use grid_utilities, only: trim_grid
5177  use eq_vars, only: vac_perm
5178  use num_vars, only: eq_style
5179  use helena_vars, only: rbphi_h, h_h_11, h_h_12
5180  use splines, only: spline3
5181 
5182  character(*), parameter :: rout_name = 'test_p'
5183 
5184  ! input / output
5185  type(grid_type), intent(in) :: grid_eq ! equilibrium grid
5186  type(eq_1_type), intent(in) :: eq_1 ! flux equilibrium variables
5187  type(eq_2_type), intent(in) :: eq_2 ! metric equilibrium variables
5188 
5189  ! local variables
5190  integer :: norm_id(2) ! untrimmed normal indices for trimmed grids
5191  integer :: norm_id_f(2) ! norm_id transposed to full grid
5192  real(dp), allocatable :: res(:,:,:,:) ! result variable
5193  integer :: id, jd, kd ! counters
5194  character(len=max_str_ln) :: file_name ! name of plot file
5195  character(len=max_str_ln) :: description ! description of plot
5196  integer :: tot_dim(3), loc_offset(3) ! total dimensions and local offset
5197  type(grid_type) :: grid_trim ! trimmed equilibrium grid
5198 
5199  ! initialize ierr
5200  ierr = 0
5201 
5202  ! output
5203  call writo('Going to test the consistency of the equilibrium variables &
5204  &with the given pressure')
5205  call lvl_ud(1)
5206 
5207  ! trim extended grid into plot grid
5208  ierr = trim_grid(grid_eq,grid_trim,norm_id)
5209  chckerr('')
5210 
5211  ! set up res
5212  allocate(res(grid_trim%n(1),grid_trim%n(2),grid_trim%loc_n_r,2))
5213 
5214  ! user output
5215  call writo('Checking if mu_0 D2 p = 1/J (D3 B_2 - D2_B3)')
5216  call lvl_ud(1)
5217 
5218  ! set total and local dimensions and local offset
5219  tot_dim = [grid_trim%n(1),grid_trim%n(2),grid_trim%n(3)]
5220  loc_offset = [0,0,grid_trim%i_min-1]
5221 
5222  ! calculate mu_0 D2p
5223  res(:,:,:,1) = &
5224  &(eq_2%g_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),c([2,3],.true.),0,0,1) - &
5225  &eq_2%g_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),c([3,3],.true.),0,1,0))/&
5226  &eq_2%jac_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,0,0) - &
5227  &(eq_2%g_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),c([2,3],.true.),0,0,0)*&
5228  &eq_2%jac_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,0,1) - &
5229  &eq_2%g_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),c([3,3],.true.),0,0,0)*&
5230  &eq_2%jac_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,1,0))/ &
5231  &(eq_2%jac_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,0,0)**2)
5232  res(:,:,:,1) = res(:,:,:,1)/eq_2%jac_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,0,0)
5233  !!call plot_HDF5('var','TEST_Dg_FD_23',eq_2%g_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),c([2,3],.true.),0,0,1))
5234  !!call plot_HDF5('var','TEST_g_FD_23',eq_2%g_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),c([2,3],.true.),0,0,0))
5235  !!call plot_HDF5('var','TEST_Dg_FD_33',eq_2%g_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),c([3,3],.true.),0,1,0))
5236  !!call plot_HDF5('var','TEST_g_FD_33',eq_2%g_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),c([3,3],.true.),0,0,0))
5237  !!call plot_HDF5('var','TEST_Dg_FD',eq_2%jac_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,0,1))
5238  !!call plot_HDF5('var','TEST_g_FD',eq_2%jac_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,0,0))
5239 
5240  ! save mu_0 D2p in res
5241  do kd = norm_id(1),norm_id(2)
5242  res(:,:,kd-norm_id(1)+1,2) = vac_perm*eq_1%pres_FD(kd,1)
5243  end do
5244 
5245  ! set some variables
5246  file_name = 'TEST_D2p'
5247  description = 'Testing whether mu_0 D2 p = 1/J (D3 B_2 - D2_B3)'
5248 
5249  ! plot difference
5250  call plot_diff_hdf5(res(:,:,:,1),res(:,:,:,2),file_name,tot_dim,&
5251  &loc_offset,description,output_message=.true.)
5252 
5253  call lvl_ud(-1)
5254 
5255  ! user output
5256  call writo('Checking if mu_0 J D1p = 0 => D3 B_1 = D2 B_3')
5257  call lvl_ud(1)
5258 
5259  ! calculate D3 B1
5260  res(:,:,:,1) = &
5261  &eq_2%g_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),c([1,3],.true.),0,0,1)/&
5262  &eq_2%jac_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,0,0) - &
5263  &eq_2%g_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),c([1,3],.true.),0,0,0)*&
5264  &eq_2%jac_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,0,1) / &
5265  &eq_2%jac_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,0,0)**2
5266 
5267  ! calculate D1 B3
5268  res(:,:,:,2) = &
5269  &eq_2%g_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),c([3,3],.true.),1,0,0)/&
5270  &eq_2%jac_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,0,0) - &
5271  &eq_2%g_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),c([3,3],.true.),0,0,0)*&
5272  &eq_2%jac_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),1,0,0) / &
5273  &eq_2%jac_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,0,0)**2
5274 
5275  ! set some variables
5276  file_name = 'TEST_D1p'
5277  description = 'Testing whether D3 B_1 = D1 B_3'
5278 
5279  ! plot difference
5280  call plot_diff_hdf5(res(:,:,:,1),res(:,:,:,2),file_name,tot_dim,&
5281  &loc_offset,description,output_message=.true.)
5282 
5283  call lvl_ud(-1)
5284 
5285  ! extra testing if Helena
5286  if (eq_style.eq.2) then
5287  ! set norm_id_f for quantities tabulated on full grid
5288  norm_id_f = grid_eq%i_min+norm_id-1
5289 
5290  ! user output
5291  call writo('Checking if D2 B_3 |F = D1 (qF+qh_11/F) |H')
5292  call lvl_ud(1)
5293 
5294  ! calculate if D2 B_3 = D1 (qF) + D1 (q/F h_11)
5295  res(:,:,:,1) = &
5296  &(eq_2%g_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),c([3,3],.true.),0,1,0)/&
5297  &eq_2%jac_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,0,0) - &
5298  &eq_2%g_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),c([3,3],.true.),0,0,0)*&
5299  &eq_2%jac_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,1,0)/ &
5300  &(eq_2%jac_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,0,0)**2))
5301  do jd = 1,grid_trim%n(2)
5302  do id = 1,grid_trim%n(1)
5303  ierr = spline3(grid_trim%loc_r_E,&
5304  &eq_1%q_saf_E(norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0)*&
5305  &rbphi_h(norm_id_f(1):norm_id_f(2))+&
5306  &eq_1%q_saf_E(norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0)*&
5307  &h_h_11(id,norm_id_f(1):norm_id_f(2))/&
5308  &rbphi_h(norm_id_f(1):norm_id_f(2)),&
5309  &grid_trim%loc_r_E,dynew=res(id,jd,:,2))
5310  chckerr('')
5311  end do
5312  end do
5313 
5314  ! set some variables
5315  file_name = 'TEST_D2B_3'
5316  description = 'Testing whether D2 B_3 |F = D1 (qF+qh_11/F) |H'
5317 
5318  ! plot difference
5319  call plot_diff_hdf5(res(:,:,:,1),res(:,:,:,2),file_name,tot_dim,&
5320  &loc_offset,description,output_message=.true.)
5321 
5322  call lvl_ud(-1)
5323 
5324  ! user output
5325  call writo('Checking if D3 B_2 |F = -q/F D2 h_11 + F q'' |H')
5326  call lvl_ud(1)
5327 
5328  ! calculate if D3 B_2 = -q/F D2 h_11 + F D1 q
5329  res(:,:,:,1) = &
5330  &eq_2%g_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),c([2,3],.true.),0,0,1)/&
5331  &eq_2%jac_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,0,0) - &
5332  &eq_2%g_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),c([2,3],.true.),0,0,0)*&
5333  &eq_2%jac_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,0,1)/ &
5334  &(eq_2%jac_FD(:,:,norm_id(1):norm_id(2),0,0,0)**2)
5335  do kd = norm_id(1),norm_id(2)
5336  do jd = 1,grid_trim%n(2)
5337  ierr = spline3(grid_eq%theta_E(:,jd,kd),&
5338  &h_h_12(:,kd+grid_eq%i_min-1),grid_eq%theta_E(:,jd,kd),&
5339  &dynew=res(:,jd,kd-norm_id(1)+1,2))
5340  chckerr('')
5341  end do
5342  res(:,:,kd-norm_id(1)+1,2) = &
5343  &-eq_1%q_saf_E(kd,0)/rbphi_h(kd+grid_eq%i_min-1) * &
5344  &res(:,:,kd-norm_id(1)+1,2) + &
5345  &rbphi_h(kd+grid_eq%i_min-1) * &
5346  &eq_1%q_saf_E(kd,1)
5347  end do
5348 
5349  ! set some variables
5350  file_name = 'TEST_D3B_2'
5351  description = 'Testing whether D3 B_2 |F = -D2 (qh_12/F) + f q'' |H'
5352 
5353  ! plot difference
5354  call plot_diff_hdf5(res(:,:,:,1),res(:,:,:,2),file_name,tot_dim,&
5355  &loc_offset,description,output_message=.true.)
5356 
5357  call lvl_ud(-1)
5358  end if
5359 
5360  ! clean up
5361  call grid_trim%dealloc()
5362 
5363  ! user output
5364  call lvl_ud(-1)
5365  call writo('Test complete')
5366  end function test_p
5367 #endif
